name: Dev_Hell
description: Welcome to Dev_Hell, the dark comedy game about the unrealistic expectations and chaos of the tech industry. Use coding skills to complete poorly-defined features, manage relationships with coworkers, and survive long enough to ship a product that may or may not crash on launch...

name: Unyielder
description: Unyielder is an intense Boss-Rush Movement-Shooter with a flexible and exploitable Roguelite-Looter sandbox. Carve your way through the war-torn lands of Antarctica, Hunt down war machines and Assemble your arsenal of destruction.

name: Kitchen Sync: Aloha!
description: Kitchen Sync: Aloha! is a cheerful single player kitchen sim with a Tactical RPG twist. Cook delicious Hawaiian food by leading your team of chefs. Explore the Island, discover kitchens, meet cooks, collect recipes, and achieve your dream of becoming the best restaurant!

name: One Card One Shot: Mafia
description: Enter the world of the mafia, with an agile and dynamic Card Game that will challenge you in your free moments or addict you for hours! Choose a mission and hit the target in seconds! What awaits you with each card turned over? Will you become the legend feared by all or will you fall into oblivion?

name: Dr. Emmerson's Nocturnes
description: Dive into the worlds of the best classic weird fiction and cosmic horror writers. Try out our original approach to bringing literature into the interactive medium. Relax and let Dr. Emmerson guide you through all colors of dread.

name: Nivoz Running Canned
description: Missile attacks that automatically pursue enemies, switching control to a companion who will not be knocked down, etc. This is a third-person action game in which the player fights using slightly peculiar abilities.

name: Detective Butler and the King of Hearts
description: The members of a university Detection Club find themselves entangled in a series of murders. Follow Detective Butler through the eyes of his sidekick Gilligan as the two set out to find the culprit. Can they unravel the truth before the serial killer claims another victim?

name: Respark
description: A roguelite-platformer in which squirrels shoot fireworks in a cute world! Choose from about 30 different fireworks to face a mysterious course that changes with each challenge. You can even design and use your own original fireworks.

name: Not Only Nine
description: A narrative turn-based RPG where the only fights are the bosses. Play as a cat and journey through the afterlife to save your human. Meet loveable characters and explore what it means to exist.

name: Henry Halfhead
description: Meet Henry, merely half a head, but with the peculiar ability to possess and control any object within their reach. Discover every object's unique properties and abilities and cleverly combine them to progress through Henry’s not-so-ordinary everyday life.

name: Poke All Toads
description: A puzzle game starring mischievous fairies. Solve levels by working as a team, operating dangerous machinery and manipulating local wildlife.

name: Lamia's Bambina
description: Lamia's Bambina is a unique game centered around the trials of the Lamia tribe. Reclaim stolen territory from the rival Harpy tribe by training, forming formidable parties, and facing off in battle. The fate of the Lamias lies with you. Unite, Lamia's Bambina!

name: Changer Seven
description: Fast-Paced Lane-Based Action Brawler. The legendary Changers 7 heroes must fight a new threat that changes the citizens of Sunny Point into terrifying beings! But as they investigate and defeat "villain of the week" like enemies, they suspect that someone from their own group may be behind it all.

name: The Doorway Effect
description: The Doorway Effect is a 1-4-player co-op psychological horror roguelike. Explore the inner world of a dying man's mind, racing through door after door in a labyrinth of nightmares. Encounter traumas incarnate, and discover the secrets locked within. If you can survive long enough...

name: Neon Death Drop
description: A fabulous, fast-paced top-down action game Control and manipulate your environment; Slay rogue robots with stylish go-go dance moves; Sling enemies around with dazzling kinetic force!

name: The Lacerator
description: A mix of classic survival horror and trash movies, play as an 80's porn actor and beware of every corner because you can get Lacerator and lose a limb in real time... But you can still adapt and survive.

name: Oxide Room 208
description: After Matt’s tragic disappearance in room 104 of the Night Soul Motel, his business partner Josh is still trapped there at the mercy of a ruthless and cruel scientist. The lives of Kat, Josh and Matt crossed paths in science —a macabre science orchestrated by Doc’s deadly hands.

name: Blacksmith Master
description: Manage your own medieval smithy in Blacksmith Master and supervise the entire process from mining ores and gems to designing and selling finished products. Forge everything from weapons and armor to tools and cooking utensils to fund your craft and become the Blacksmith Master.

name: Discounty
description: Discounty is a supermarket management life simulation game. Keep shelves stocked, serve customers, and source local wares in the once-thriving town of Blomkest to revitalize your shop and the community. But be careful. The proud Blomkestians are not looking to be saved by some shopkeeper.

name: Bloody Horror Plant
description: Bloody Horror Plant – probably the bloodiest casual point and click adventure game ever! Help Horror Plant solve interesting and funny point and click puzzles, kill evil dwarfs, save the forest and its creatures!

name: Embervale.TV
description:
Welcome to Embervale.TV, the ultimate fantasy role play game that you can play fully as an extension on Twitch! Join the adventure and immerse yourself in a world of magic and wonder where you can become the strongest player, team up with other players, and create the most powerful guild.

Embark on thrilling adventures alongside your favorite streamers and experience the thrill of victory and the agony of defeat!

name: Beyond These Stars
description: Journey on the back of the space whale Kewa, building a city for your people as you travel across the galaxy seeking purpose and answers, and developing deep relationships with the universe around you.

name: Ebola Village
description: Ebola Village - this is a classic survival horror game from the 90s with a focus on atmosphere and player immersion. Solve puzzles, follow the story carefully and use various weapons in a brutal fight for survival. Danger lurks at every turn.

name: EbiTapes
description: Go on an adventure to meet fun new friends, help them out, and create delicious beats along the way! Record the sounds of the world and make your own cool music.

name: HexLands
description: HexLands is a turn-based, roguelike city builder, set on peaceful, procedural medieval islands. Settle as many islands as possible, as they are getting less and less habitable! Manage your resources, complete quests, use special tools and synergize perks! How far will your empire reach?

name: Bagdex
description: The journey begins! Collect over 160 creatures inspired by Brazilian culture, manage and customize your base, conquer challenging battles, and unravel the mystery behind this fantastic world!

name: Among the Stars
description: Separated by an illegal fire, two indigenous sisters try to reunite with the help of an ancient nature entity.

name: Project Box
description: 2D horizontal scroll adventure game, interweaving unique art style, horror, suspense and fantasy. A horror secret is hidden in the apartment where lost children are going to be engulfed by nightmares.

name: Exilium
description: Exilium is an atmospheric point & click project. As an exorcist, you will face demons and occult rituals. Cast out evil spirits with your skills and improvised means. Uncover dark secrets and restore balance before it's too late...

name: StarVaders
description: Defend the Earth from an alien invasion in the ULTIMATE fusion of deckbuilding and grid-based tactics. Pilot a mech, discover game-breaking combos, and protect the future of humanity in this endlessly replayable roguelike.

name: Omen Exitio: Hunger
description: Forces beyond human comprehension draw a macabre veil over the icy NY of 1927. A child has disappeared and you, a reporter with an unhappy past as an artist, become entangled in the drama. In this story, inspired by true events, you will investigate between reality, dreams and Lovecraftian horrors.

name: Stand-Alone
description: Stand-Alone is a 2D roguelite action platformer game. A world inhabited by athro, a robot that lost everything along with its memories due to an explosion at the center, is the only one left and wants to carry on its beliefs.

name: Professor Layton and the New World of Steam
description:
Professor Layton and the New World of Steam depicts the world one year after the events of "Professor Layton and the Unwound Future".

Due to a mysterious incident in Steam Bison, a new adventure for Layton and Luke begins!

name: Twistales
description: On the day of what she believed to be her ‘Happy ending’, Cinderella witnesses the collapse of her universe and the murder of her beloved. With the help of a magic grimoire, in search of the truth, she walks into various fairy tales, through worlds that are now disturbing and enigmatic. Fighting enemies corrupted by a strange curse, the princess becomes a mighty warrior, determined to resolve this chaos.

name: Gilded Destiny
description: Gilded Destiny is a grand strategy game depicting the transformative era of the Industrial Revolution. You will take the helm of the country of your choice and transform it from a backward agrarian society to an industrial powerhouse.

name: Little Eternal Chronicle
description: Manipulate time! Let's do mischief! Helpless 10 year olds are given only one weapon: a clock. This world will soon be destroyed...

name: KaiJu Girls
description: Kaiju Girls is a Visual Novel full of Monster Girls. The protagonist lost his memory in an accident and became a KaijuTamer, with the Kaiju girls in the Kaiju world full of danger adventure! In the wonderful and exciting adventure journey in the protagonist will slowly recall his memories.

name: Whisper Mountain Outbreak
description: An isometric co-op PvE multiplayer survival horror game. It's 1998, and an ancient curse has been unleashed, trapping everyone on Mt. Bisik. When a mysterious fog appeared, people started hearing whispers and seeing monsters. Fight, explore, solve puzzles, and figure out a way to escape... together!

name: Qisah Tomang: Cycle Ends
description: Qisah Tomang: Cycle Ends is a story-rich RPG. The story is set in an East Asia inspired fantasy world. Fight off the Demon Tomang and its minion and discover the truth behind the Cycle of Hatred and put an end to it in this classic pixel RPG.

name: Big Boss: A Villain Simulator
description: An asymmetrical roguelite experience where the player is the boss, fighting heroes for rank in EVILLC to become the final boss. Equip spells, lay traps, and take command of minions to ensure your rise to the top!

name: Imperial Ambitions
description: Discover and colonize the world, Allocate your labor force, Monopolize markets, Fight tactical battles, Survive the age of imperialism as the world turns into a war zone.

name: Gurei
description: An action platformer where you face challenging enemies inspired by Japanese mythology and acquire their powers. Choose your fights in any order, knowing that each opponent gets stronger as the game progresses!

name: Unwound
description: Lose yourself in a surreal candyland adventure about transformation and escapism. Descend into a land of weirdos and forgotten memories as you assemble a new you from whatever you find.

name: Timeless Heart VR
description: Timeless heart VR is an action VR roguelike game, As the second work of Timeless Stories series, this work further simplifies and enriches the unique sword skill system of the series. Advancing in the unknown labyrinth with Lycanea, and break through this blockade from fate!

name: The Starbites: Taste of Desert
description: The story of a girl's growth and adventure on a vast desert planet, "Bitter."

name: BrokenLore: Unfollow
description: BrokenLore: Unfollow is a surreal horror game where you play as a victim of bullying, fighting terrifying monsters as you uncover a dark mystery in a thrilling journey of terror. It pushes you to the edge of your seat as you explore the dark impact of social media on mental health.

name: Echoes of the Living
description: Echoes of the Living is a dark Classic Survival Horror inspired by the greatest hits from the 90's focused on reimagining visual horror, your goal is to make it alive while uncovering the truth about the incident.

name: Opus: Prism Peak
description: Opus: Prism Peak is a narrative adventure where your choices lead to divergent endings. Play as a photographer lost in an ethereal realm, and unveil its mysteries with your camera to find a way home.

name: Full Fathom
description: Full Fathom is an oceanic survival horror game. Pilot a deteriorating submarine as it drifts through grim waters, keeping it maintained as it is your only lifeline in the hostile, merciless ocean.

name: Trailer Park Life
description: Build and manage your own trailer park to either become a peaceful haven or a pit of unruly partiers. Expand on services and amenities to keep tenants happy. Manage staff to keep your park safe and clean or let chaos run amuck and risk it all for higher gains.

name: Devil's Liminal
description: A demon's imprint, a final summer. A horror and queer romance visual novel.

name: Warside
description:
Warside is a new game that cuts to the core of what made classic turn-based tactics games so great. A great story mode campaign, unique Commanders with totally different playstyles, awesome Battle Powers, and a wide variety of terrain and units.

Choose your Commander, assemble your forces, and battle your way to victory.

Warside is a love letter to the turn-based tactics games of the last three decades.

We grew up playing the games that spawned the genre. Games like Nectaris and the Advance Wars series. We have continued to enjoy modern iterations such as Battalion, Into The Breach, Wargroove, and UniWar. Yet we yearn for more. We feel something is missing... something we think we can bring back.

If a modern version was released today, what would that look like? How would it play? How do we update the formula whilst retaining the charm of the classics?

We combine the game mechanics you already love with awesome new features to push the genre foward. We keep a retro pixel art feel but with higher-fidelity and higher-resolution graphics than any of the genre's predecessors.

Warside is the game we have waited for. The game that no one else made.

name: Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days
description: Texas, 1980. Walton City has fallen to a zombie outbreak. Lead a band of desperate survivors from refuge to refuge by scavenging, crafting, and fighting in a relentless struggle for survival. Plan wisely, stick together, and — above all — keep moving if you want to make it out alive.

name: Death Stranding 2: On The Beach
description: Embark on an inspiring mission of human connection beyond the UCA. Sam — with companions by his side — sets out on a new journey to save humanity from extinction. Join them as they traverse a world beset by otherworldly enemies, obstacles and a haunting question: should we have connected?

name: Judas
description: A disintegrating starship. A desperate escape plan. You are the mysterious and troubled Judas. Your only hope for survival is to make or break alliances with your worst enemies. Will you work together to fix what you broke – or will you leave it to burn?

name: King's Blade
description: Take on the role of a warrior of an elite royal squad and defeat the bloodthirsty Barganian Empire in King's Blade - classic beat 'em up game set in a heroic fantasy setting.

name: Winds of Arcana: Ruination
description: Winds of Arcana: Ruination is a 2.5D Metroidvania featuring a customizable combat system set in the treacherous and magical world of Lirna. Experience a powerful, lore-rich story as you discover ancient magic, upgrade your abilities, and battle dangerous foes that stand in your way.

name: V's Rage
description: V’s Rage is an hand drawn action-adventure game that pays homage to classic action arcade games from the ‘80es-’90es.

name: In Stone
description: In the late 19th century, a sculpture is confined in a monastery asylum. It's in your hands to follow the blue vision to explore the monastery's deeper secrets, or to escape the stone prison by gathering clues inside the hospital.

name: GladiEaters
description: A hybrid between Turn-Based Tactics and Cooking Mini-Games where food you cook turns into powerful Gladieaters for you to command. Cook your team from Eggs, Pastries and Vegetables - balancing the Taste of the team between Sweet, Salty and Umami - to unlock powerful taste twists.

name: Twin Jet Racer
description: Two jets. Two triggers. That’s all you need to swerve, drift, corkscrew, loop or even fly to reach the next checkpoint and top the leaderboard. Master the controls and the physics to progress to the next class of racer and unlock greater challenges. Compete against friends or against the clock.

name: Bride Corruption
description: Do you need a wedding planner, by any chase? "Weddings & Co." will organise your wedding, take care of everything you need, and as a bonus - corrupt the bride!

name: Super Cucumber
description: Super Cucumber is a 16-bit inspired action-adventure game filled with tight platforming, unlockable abilities and plenty of secrets to discover. Traverse more than six towers and overcome dozens of levels, fight your way past devious bosses and become the greatest Aardvark Superhero in the world!

name: Lost and Found Co.
description: Lost & Found Co. is a hidden object adventure in a cozy and immersive world. Join a cast of quirky characters on their epic journey across countless magical locations. Find lost items, solve puzzles, and help a tiny dragon regain her power!

name: Hyper Drill
description: Hyper Drill is a speedrunning runner game, where you fly at supersonic speed and destroy everything in your path. Drill through any obstacle, jump between different galaxies, and uncover the mysteries of the universe.

name: Total World Liberation
description: Open World Survival Automation Crafting Building Turn-Based game, yup that's a huge mix of genres and it works!

name: Farmistic
description: Farmistic is a top-down farming simulation game in early developement by an independant developer. Start small, work your fields, buy more land and equipment, and automate!

name: PenguInn
description: PenguInn is a classic single-player 2D platformer that takes you on a journey through a dream world made in AI-generated art. Collect beautiful art by completing 100 levels before waking up from your dream.

name: Chyss
description: Chyss is a turnbased, tactical 1vs1 game inspired from chess. You can move, attack, and consume your mana to summon new units, cast spells and use items when it's your turn. Your characters both have a move type and range and an attack type and range. Overcome your opponent's team!

name: NecroTactics
description: An auto-battler roguelite with tower defense and horde survival elements. Draft and position your army, develop your graveyard, equip units with powerful items, cast spells, and place turrets to annihilate your opponent's army in seconds!

name: Sincognito
description: Sincognito, is a 5-15 players SOCIAL DEDUCTION, horror, stealth game in which players, split between two distinct teams - Humans & Sins - must use communication with proximity voice chat, teamwork to complete tasks, skills for combat, betrayal, and ultimately mind games to defeat the opposite team.

name: Adaptory
description: Adaptory is a 2D base building/survival game where you're looking after a crew of four characters who have crash landed on a procedurally generated planetoid in deep space. In order to survive, you're challenged to build a home and ultimately a community in this complex environment, and along the way learn more about the unique characters in your crew.

name: Astromeda
description: Astromeda is an adventure RPG, featuring unique fast-paced and turn-based battles in a mysterious, charming world. You are a human who returns to an Earth inhabited by intelligent Bacteria. Explore a rich world, befriend or fight quirky characters, and uncover the mysteries of the Bacteria race. The game is inspired by Undertale, H

name: Play Rough
description: Play Rough is a roleplaying game set in the surreal, post-apocalyptic wasteland of what was once California. It's a place where humans live side-by-side with living cartoons, twisted abominations of ink and flesh, and... Clowns...?

name: Nanomon
description: Nanomon are tiny, virtual pets who hang out in the corner of your screen. Train, explore, discover, and play with your Nanomon so they can evolve into the perfect companion! Only the best, most attentive trainers will help their Nanomon achieve their life goal!

name: RunMan Turbo
description: The indie legend returns, now in a 2D platformer where you speedrun randomly generated levels. Bounce, slide, jump, and run fast as heck. Easy to play and challenging to master, with an awesome soundtrack and a style that will make you go, "Oh snap!"

name: Relieve
description: Stories about people who stucked between life and death, in the middle-world called "World of Agony". Help them escape and try to relieve fate of those who left there forever.

name: High School Dirty Secrets
description: High School Dirty Secrets is a horror/puzzle adventure where Kasuga wakes up locked inside her high school with no memory of how she got there. As she searches for a way out, strange and unsettling events unfold, leading her to uncover dark secrets hidden within the school's walls.

name: Streets of Rogue 2
description: Streets of Rogue goes open-world! Fight, sneak, hack, drive, build, farm, quest, craft, and just live in this non-linear sandbox with a focus on fun. Unlimited adventures await!

name: Death Relives
description: Be prepared for a first-person look on life through the eyes of a teenager, who is trying to escape from mighty Aztec god Xipe Totec. Get ready for a chaotic experience with horror and survival mechanics.

name: Call of the Golden Valley
description: Become a detective and delve into the depths of desire and motivation to solve the mystery of vanishing hikers in the Australian bush. Follow clues, solve puzzles, dive into conspiracy theories, and find your missing friend. This thrilling story is an immersive escape into a true crime-like mystery.

name: The Big Catch
description: The Big Catch is a 3D platformer all about tight expressive player movement, exploration, and FISH. In addition to inheriting the best parts of retro and modern platformers, The Big Catch is designed to be something fresh (like the fish).

name: Delilah
description: Eastern Europe is the newest Circle of Hell, but outside its walls things aren't much better. Relentless action, pixelated gore, 256 colors. That is Delilah.

name: Furcifer's Fungeon
description: Furcifer’s Fungeon is a loot-based dungeon crawler action roguelike. Forge powerful character builds using common, rare and legendary items and upgrade your collection for following runs!

name: Cozy Room
description: Cozy Room is an idle game for chilling. Enjoy your time with a feline companion.

name: Kitsune: The Journey of Adashino
description: "Where will their light lead them?" Kitsune is a fox girl who finds herself on Adashino Island and starts travelling with her Frog friend. Neon signs give light and color to the island with a Japanese-inspired atmosphere. Something is lurking in the shadows, inching ever closer...

name: Rue Valley
description: A highly emotional RPG with Personality System and Mind Map Mechanics. Survive the unjust psychotherapy, lift yourself from rock bottom and uncover the mystery of the time anomaly that keeps the world stuck in 47 minutes.

name: Orc Warchief: Strategy City Builder
description: Become an Orc warchief and fight for survival of your race. Rebuild your village and train your warriors. Gather resources and craft your weapons. Raise your warbanner and gather The Horde.

name: Reclaim the Sea
description: Reclaim the Sea is a roguelike strategy game set in a pirate fantasy world. Fight your way through randomly generated maps and text events. Command your pirate crew, upgrade your ship and make tactical decisions to beat the boss and save the world… or die trying.

name: Bangkok Story: A Stray Dog
description: A top-down 2D story-driven adventure game inspired by real-life events. Traverse and experience the life of a formerly homeless man through an interview of how he regained his sense of self by telling his past to a stray dog. Set in Bangkok, Thailand 2017.

name: Tiny Bookshop
description: Leave everything behind and open a Tiny Bookshop by the sea in this ambient narrative management game. Stock your wagon, set up shop in scenic locations, and navigate a post-capitalist future alongside Bookstonbury’s eclectic cast of characters.

name: Tenebris Somnia
description:
Tenebris Somnia is a horror adventure in the same vein as survival horror classics like Silent Hill or Resident Evil, but transferred to a retro 2D environment more typical of the N.E.S. or Famicom.

You will struggle to survive by solving puzzles and fighting horrible creatures.

The secret ingredient of the game is its cinematics. When you reach certain key points you will see sequences with a completely different aesthetic, made in live action with real actors and created by a professional film crew.

name: Wonderland Quest
description: Wonderland Quest is a casual point & click adventure game. Travel across Wonderland teeming with colorful challenges, surprises and creatures, brought to life with beautiful artwork.

name: Assassin's Creed Jade
description:
Explore the path of Xia in Assassin’s Creed Codename Jade. Set in the third century BC during the time of one of the first unified empires in China, an unprecedented era of trade and cultural exchange between East and West is just beginning, but with this comes new challenges and threats lurking in the shadows.

From the Great Wall outside the empire’s borders to the imperial capital of Xianyang, journey through a world filled with ancient history and hidden dangers. Defend against the Xiongnu and work to dismantle conspiracies, taking on greater responsibilities, and facing new challenges.

name: Marvel 1943: Rise of Hydra
description:
This narrative-driven ensemble game stars Captain America Steve Rogers, Black Panther Azzuri (T'Challa's grandfather), U.S. soldier and member of the Howling Commandos Gabriel Jones, and leader of the fledgling Wakandan Spy Network, Nanali.

All four characters will be playable at different parts of the story. According to Skydance, players can look forward to "intuitive controls and exhilarating second-to-second gameplay that captures the action and excitement of Marvel, inspired by landmark comics, television, and films, as they navigate this all-new glob-trotting adventure."

name: Escape
description: Escape is an online co-op game for 1 - 4 players. You and your team have entered a haunted mansion and got stuck there. Explore the procedurally generated environment, kill monsters, find clues, equip different weapons, and escape at any cost.

name: Perfect Tides: Station to Station
description: A point n' click sequel to Perfect Tides about the momentum and whiplash of young adulthood.

name: Mystical Conquests
description: A turn-based fantasy strategy game that fuses 4X, RPG and survival. Lead your faction in a world where the forces of evil are trying to destroy every civilizations. Expand your realm, improves your cities, recruit heroes, seek allies, build an army and try to save the world!

name: Stick It to the Stickman
description: Stick it to the Stickman is a practical guide for anybody seeking to climb the corporate ladder in the fastest way possible. A groin-kicking, staple-gunning, chainsaw-wielding roguelike brawler loaded with high-impact, physics-based combat, copious amounts of coffee, and weaponized farts!

name: Penny Blood
description:
Penny Blood is a alternative history horror JRPG and spiritual successor to the Shadow Hearts series led by former Shadow Hearts series director, Matzuso Machida.

The year is 1923 and American PI Matthew Farrell is tasked by the Bureau of Investigation to investigate a New York asylum overtaken by supernatural entities. Matthew's mission soon takes him across the world as he battles an otherworldly threat alongside a group of allies.

name: Lou's Lagoon
description: A cosy open world adventure about running a seaplane delivery service. Customize your character, discover new islands, harvest goods, solve a family mystery, and work to keep an adorable island community afloat.

name: Snaccoon
description: Snaccoon is a stealth/exploration game set in a dense, stylized city. The player controls an above-average-intelligence raccoon searching for snack foods after the local city government has banned them. Stumbling across a budding black market of cakes & chips, players will have to steal phones & items to engage in a series of deals that will take them all over the city to trade their way up to a coveted box of their favorite treats.

name: Goman: Stuck in the Avici Hell
description: Goman is a Infinitely looped scroll style battle action game.

name: Tokyo Underground Killer
description: Dive into the neon-drenched deep underground of Tokyo as Kobayashi, a deadly assassin who harnesses the power of blood energy. Use your sword, mystical abilities and powerful weapons to assassinate highly dangerous maniacs and stop the invasion of the brutal Flatliners terrorizing Tokyo.

name: Rogue Blight
description: Rogue Blight is a souls-like, rogue-lite, combat focused RPG. Fight your way through ever-changing maps. Customize your playstyle based on what you find. Meet other struggling heroes. Death will be punishing, but you will get stronger with every journey. Are you up for the challenge?

name: K-Pop Idol Stories: Road to Debut
description: A love letter to the thrilling world of K-pop! In this life simulator, you're the manager responsible for scouting talent, organising schedules, creating budgets, planning social media, choosing music, and styling your idols. Your goal? To debut the next big K-pop idol group!

name: My Familiar
description: In this RPG, wake up as a fresh familiar on the mean streets of Wish City, where the denizens are dark and corruption is king. Fight, flee, and aggressively rap your way through a vibrant inner city gauntlet, chock full of dysfunctional demons, in flashy, over the top, turn-based battles.

name: Train Mechanic Simulator 2025
description: Take on the role of a qualified Train Mechanic. Repair broken steam locomotives using your fully stacked workshop. Find out how complex and difficult this job really is. Become one of the few that know how to repair an old train.

name: Every Day We Fight
description: Every Day We Fight challenges the form of the turn-based tactics genre by introducing a unique blend of strategy and action elements.

name: Colony
description: Make your own Colony. Solo or with friends. Fight with other colonies to get resources or land. Upgrade your colony and get from zero to the Moon. Automatization should be your priority. Mining, crafting, and logistic system in your colony, that's the key. Your Colony needs you, don't wait.

name: Wander Stars
description: Wander Stars is a turn-based RPG with roguelite elements where you make your own attacks by combining words! Create your own fighting techniques, befriend your rivals, and explore the universe in this story-driven adventure inspired by 90s anime.

name: Zix
description: Spread chaos to lands locked in a cycle of order with a variety of powers and abilities in this multiplayer co-operative VR roguelike. Experience an intuitive combat system paired with fluid parkour-movement and versatile stacking boons earned through showing your devotion to the chaos god, ZIX.

name: Rise of Rebellion
description: "Rise of Rebellion" is a 3D action RPG that pursues the tension of confronting strong enemies and sweating in your hands. People worshiped God and the land where God dwelled. Survive the battlefield by mastering the deep tactics of melee weapons and the energy "May" derived from the earth.

name: Twilight Wars
description: Twilight Wars is a dungeon crawler set in a cyberpunk world where secret agents battle for corporate interests. Bring back a secret organization, recruit and equip a team of specialists - and eliminate those who stand in your way!

name: Genimas: Life Reborn
description: you are Drassil, a demigod raised and trained by Freyja far from civilization, your destiny is to defeat the evil entity known as Ragnarok and to achieve it, you will have to evolve genetically traveling through the 9 Nordic worlds.

name: Etheria: Restart
description: Etheria: Restart is a turn-based Action-RPG game set in a neo-contemporary virtual city developed by XD Entertainment Pte. Ltd.. While encompassing Etheria, the virtual city, you, a Hyper-Linker, will fight side by side with Animus against virus invasions and explore hidden stories.

name: Sonokuni
description: Sonokuni is a hardcore high-speed action game. In a world of bio-science fiction and Japanese mythology, manipulate time and space to protect your dying country from the forces of a superpower. This experience is truly HIPHOP as you continue to struggle for a solution other than violence.

name: Alara Prime
description: ALARA Prime is a free-to-play, 4v4v4 competitive tactical first-person shooter. Choose your class, utilize a wide array of gadgets, take advantage of your surroundings, and work together to claim victory. The 3-team format of Transmission mode opens the door to new strategic choices. Teams can backstab, stay focused on the objective, or wait for their moment when the enemy least expects an attack. Pull into the lead and you’ll have to watch your back at every turn.

name: Hello Again
description: Welcome to the world's coziest time loop! Hello Again is a puzzling adventure game set on an island filled with ancient ruins. Explore strange structures, solve clockwork puzzles, and befriend cute characters to uncover the island's secrets and break the loop.

name: Ronin Trail
description: Ronin Trail is an open-world adventure game about a wandering samurai searching for his purpose. You play as a survivor of war who must take on odd jobs and bounties to make a living. The game takes place at the start of the Edo period in Japan, shortly after the country was ravaged with war. As you travel through the countryside, chaos persists as disbanded soldiers form violent gangs that terrorize the villagers. It's up to you to bring peace back to the valley.

name: Alice is Dead: Hearts and Diamonds
description: A complete remake of the classic Flash game trilogy, Alice is Dead. Hearts and Diamonds includes all new art, added puzzles, expanded lore, and plenty of secrets for old and new fans alike.

name: Lords of Ravage
description: Become the final boss of the dungeon! Create your own playing style by combining followers from different factions in spectacular turn-based combat. Build a shadow empire to find a powerful artifact that can alter the fate of this world. Choose your path as one of the "Lords of Ravage"!

name: The Alters
description: To survive on a lonely planet, Jan creates alternate versions of himself - the alters. Each alter’s personality is shaped by Jan’s various life paths. The Alters begs a simple question surrounding life-changing moments and the decisions people make: What if…?

name: Enemy of the State
description: Enemy of the State is a co-op and single-player shooter set in the world of 1920s crime lords. You’re an aspiring mobster trying to reach the top during the Prohibition era. Gather your friends and perform heists all over the world. Will you build the most powerful crime syndicate in the world?

name: Kulebra and the Souls of Limbo
description: An adventure where you’ll meet the many good and not-so-good folks of Limbo. Use your wits and keen eye to gather clues from the residents and find items that will help uncover the mystery of Limbo and its curse that traps souls into repeating the same day on loop.

name: Paper Animal Adventure
description: Paper Animal Adventure is a cute roguelike game where you can explore a colorful world, fight scary enemies, and relax with your friends at the campfire! Will you be the one to seal the timelines and find the missing king?

name: Time Flies
description: This whimsical game is part open world and part flight simulator – and you play it as a fly! You are provided with a bucket list that you can complete before you die. But the life of a fly is short – and the list is long! Go ahead and learn an instrument, become rich, read a book, go on tour, find yourself, get drunk, make someone laugh or enter the art world! And if you don’t feel like pursuing your life goals, just hang, clean your wings, listen to music or watch television. Make the best of the time you have! Because we are all going to die.

name: Tales of the Death
description: Join a comic adventure in a hand-drawn book with a life of its own. Rearrange the panels of an animated comic to reveal the stories of the world of The Death.

name: Project Timi: Sasha's Curse
description: Project Timi: Sasha's Curse is a 3D rhythmic puzzle-packed action game mashup. Use the rhythm of the music to activate magic traps, fight nightmare creatures, explore the dream worlds and unveil all the secrets that are hidden in Lucity Town.

name: Successor
description: Successor plays at a brisk pace combining fast phased action with strategical depth. To reach the king's castle, you must carve a path conquering some of its many regions. You explore the lands to become stronger and learn about your enemies whom you battle at small diorama boards together with a selection of your acquired heroes. Choose carefully between your battles, as you risk losing everything.

name: Payloaders Strike!
description: A fast-paced first person action game, with heavy emphasis on short range combat and gun combos. Free your coworkers and take down Concrete's reign!

name: The Touhou Empires
description:
The Touhou Empires is a real-time strategy simulation game (RTS) in which you lead Touhou Project characters and fairies with various abilities to fight!

Players command Touhou Project's catactors and fairies to complete the prepared missions while responding to ever-changing situations!

The game flow is as follows: players collect resources from the map, construct buildings to expand their own camps, and organize their armies to advance and march.
Then, organize your army, march forward, and battle the enemy to complete the mission!

name: Rainbow Six Mobile
description: From the acclaimed Rainbow Six franchise, Rainbow Six Mobile is a competitive, multiplayer first-person shooter experience on your phone. Compete in Rainbow Six's classic Attack vs. Defense game modes. Play as an Attacker or Defender in fast-paced 5v5 matches and face intense close-quarter combat while making timely tactical decisions. Choose from a roster of highly trained Operators, each with their own unique abilities and gadgets. Experience this ultimate tactical shooter game, designed exclusively for mobile.

name: Vivaland
description: Vivaland is the first life simulation game built with co-op in mind from the ground up. The game allows up to 8 players to live in the same town and engage with each other. Players can create and control their characters, establish families, build homes, and perform various daily activities such as sleeping, eating, and working. In addition, the game features multiplayer events and world aspects that encourage players to collaborate and play together.

name: Yours Truly
description: Yours Truly is an emotional 3rd person narrative-driven game with elements of exploration, puzzles, and platforming. Centered around Liam who is stranded in a strange world searching for his true self, and purpose while finding a way home.

name: Homura Hime
description: "Homura Hime" is a third person action game, featuring Japanese anime visuals and intense 3D bullet curtain gameplay. Alongside Homurahime, fight against Demon Girls possessed by deviant "emotions", and get closer to discovering the truth of not only the fallen, but also your own veiled legacy.

name: Windswept
description: Our feather-shelled heroes were swept away by a storm, and they need your help! In this '90s-inspired platforming adventure, take on over forty handcrafted stages to discover the secrets of their world, the moon and beyond!

name: Borneo: A Jungle Nightmare
description: Borneo: A Jungle Nightmare is an interactive horror graphic adventure, with the direction and script of Ruggero Deodato. Take control of different characters in a desperate expedition to the virgin jungles of Borneo.

name: Prospector
description: A colorful, sci-fi adventure about survival crafting and exploration in a randomized open world.

name: Mira: The Legend of the Djinns
description: An epic 2D pixel art style Metroidvania, inspired by Moroccan culture and spiritual traditions. Wield powerful ancient weapons and forge your way through unrelenting deserts, crumbling necropoli, floating islands and dangerous mountains as you try to uncover the secret of the last Djinn.

name: Critias Empire
description: Turn-based strategy game with 4x elements. Build your empire while surviving frequent disasters rained down by the ancient Gods.

name: Artis Impact
description: Artis Impact is a story-rich, adventure pixel RPG that features classic turn-based combat, upgrading your home, and exploring uniquely hand-drawn environments. Players will take on the role of official Akane, teaming up with Bot to unravel the mysteries of a future utopian world.

name: Kurama and the Cursed Isles
description: Kurama and The Cursed Isles is an adventure and Platformer Game. Explore 4 opened little area to unlock levels, resolve little quests and collect treasures. In the platformer levels, use the dash run to help you finish the levels which are based on the 4 themed seasons : Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter

name: Changa
description: A psychedelic trial-by-fire journey to sever the knot of suffering. Mastery in movement and combat will be needed on this path to inner peace. Bounce, dodge, fly, and fight the illusions of material and immaterial reality in this new kind of bullet hell.

name: Eternal Remnant: The First Chapter
description: Dive into the unforgettable tale of two siblings on the run in this emotional RPG journey. With only their wits and a cursed power too dangerous to control, they must fight, explore and scavenge to survive in an unfamiliar world. Will their bond be strong enough to endure the road ahead?

name: Contract Rush DX
description: Contract Rush DX is a hand-animated 2D Shoot 'Em Up, with multiple playable characters. Collect powerful upgrades throughout levels, and unleash them to defeat difficult boss battles!

name: Solarpunk
description:
Solarpunk is a survival game in a technically advanced world of floating islands. Alone or together with your friends, you can construct buildings, grow food, craft gadgets and explore distant islands with your own airship.

Use sunlight, wind and water to create an energy system and automate your processes like gathering ressoureces, watering your plants or catching fish.

name: Abyss Delvers
description: Abyss Delvers is an Online Action RPG. Adventure out alone or party up with your friends on an epic journey and fight the monstrous hordes of the Abyss. Featuring randomly generated campaigns, dungeons, items and more!

name: Obscurity: Unknown Threat
description: Obscurity: Unknown Threat is a horror shooter game where a team of soldiers must survive against a hidden foe. The game contains both conventional symmetrical FPS game modes as well as asymmetrical battles vs the Obscurity.

name: Cookie Run: OvenSmash
description:
Become the last Cookie standing against all odds in this fast-paced mayhem!
Dive into the Cookie Run: OvenSmash! Compete against players in a colorful battle-royale of sweet chaos. Choose from a diverse cast of powerful Cookies and engage in exhilarating action to claim victory. Crush your foes with perfectly timed skills, abilities of all flavors and tastes, and superior tactics. Victory has never tasted sweeter!

name: Christine
description: Christine is a young orphan who works at the Paris Opera, with an unexplored talent for singing. If history sometimes repeats itself, will an Angel of Music help her to achieve her dreams?

name: Candela
description: Manipulate colors and conquer challenging puzzles in this mysterious 2D platformer set in a post-apocalyptic world. Explore the overworld, uncover hidden secrets, and bring light to this dark, desolate land

name: Sir Galgano: A Medieval Tale
description: Sir Galgano is a side-scrolling medieval beat ‘em up game with RPG elements

name: Binary Golf
description: Navigate through dynamic targets and obstacles, each with unique challenges. Hit them strategically with your golf ball until the last one transforms into the cup. Use special abilities, customize your ball, and compete in the madness of Battle Mode or unravel the hidden mysteries of Story Mode.

name: Dagada's Story
description:
Dive into the depths of a snowy world in this adventure game. Explore a mountain where a tribe of strange creatures, the Daoudaounes, lives among ancient ruins, while seeking answers to the mysteries that surround you.

Dagada's Story is a Puzzle-platformer game inspired by Super Nintendo-era games. This adventure emphasizes the balance between exploration, platforming, and puzzle-solving, with responsive controls and beautiful storytelling.

Particular attention has been given to the creation of the universe and each of its graphical, sound, and game design elements. The animation aims to be smooth and lively, reminiscent of pixel art from such game as Yoshi's island or the Super Mario bros series ...

name: The Last Citadel
description: The Last Citadel is a Roguelike, Role-Based, Third-Person shooter. Embark in an expedition to uncover artifacts inside a Citadel suspended above a black hole where many challenges and deadly encounters await. Explore the ever-changing citadel alone, or with a group of up to 4 players.

name: Northwind
description: Northwind is a rogue-lite deckbuilder monster-hunting game. Hunt monsters, gather resources, and explore card smelting in Northwind Town. Discover new monsters and unlock town upgrades as you increase your hazard level.

name: Cupid Island
description: Welcome to Cupid Island, a cute life simulator about bringing couples together and nurturing their relationships. As a Cupid, you'll discover many different couples and help their love stories. Build, customize, and expand the Island using the Love, Joy, and Passion produced by the lovely residents.

name: Demon Spore
description: Blast your way out of tentacle hell as a failed lab experiment gives birth to a rapidly growing viral horror in this intense action rogue-lite inspired by 80s Monster movies. Use the lab to your advantage and improvise an escape plan before this constantly evolving life form spreads out of control.

name: Mars Tactics
description: Classic turn-based tactical combat with some modern twists. Use stress to manage RNG. Master advanced suppression mechanics. Grow troops who develop abilities, personalities & relationships based on what happens in battle. Procedural, destructible maps. Realistic bullet physics.

name: Gloomy Juncture
description:
Gloomy Juncture is a neo-noir psychological thriller and a character-driven adventure with a core focus on point & click gameplay with challenging puzzles.

Set in the 90s, the story unfolds in a decaying and morally bankrupt urban setting. You're not special; you're not a hero. One night, a single gunshot shatters the silence, setting the wheels of fate in motion. You'll step into the shoes of a mundane janitor asked to complete a final task before clocking out, and it will turn into a pulp mystery as your fate collides with the aftermath of that pivotal gunshot.

Unravel your fate and cross the edge in this peculiar tale of obsession

name: The Swordfish: Knight of the Deep
description: Embark on an epic adventure as a sword-wielding fish and restore order to the kingdom's depths. Explore an ocean world full of adorable characters, menacing foes, and hidden wonders.

name: Showa American Story
description: Showa American Story is a brand new RPG and an enthusiastic love letter to the 80s' pop culture that features a strong taste of B-Movies. Follow Choko's journey of truth and revenge across North America as she grows stronger.

name: ARC Raiders
description: ARC Raiders is a free-to-play, reimagined, cooperative action shooter that offers an intense struggle in every session: together with your squad, defend our home and resist the onslaught of ARC – a ruthless mechanized threat descending from space.

name: A Sister's Journey
description: Explore a charmingly beautiful, hand-crafted pixel art world and help Violet on her journey searching for her sister. Uncover its mysteries, face its threatening foes, and run 'n gun your way through this challenging action-metroidvania - which will put your true platforming skills to the test.

name: Greek Tragedy
description: Greek Tragedy is a retro-styled indie survival horror game with puzzle elements. Help Amy keep her life on the college campus overrun by cultists and maybe save her relationship in the process. Uncover conspiracies, sabotage occult rituals and run for your life! Nostalgic PS1 aesthetics included.

name: The Lost Wild
description: A survival horror adventure about overcoming nature’s most formidable forms of life. Explore overgrown research facilities nestled in a lush wilderness. Be resourceful, intimidate, evade, and unravel the mystery at the heart of the island.

name: Recursor
description: An action roguelite inspired by platform fighters

name: Ribby: The Game
description: It's Ribby: The Game! An RPG/Visual Novel hybrid about finding yourself, acceptance, and frogs! Use empathy to resolve issues of the potential friends you'll meet along your journey, or take a more cruel approach and murder them with words.

name: Honor of Kings: World
description:
Honor of Kings: World is a new Action RPG open world game based on the popular Honor of Kings MOBA.

Master a host of mighty skills as you roam this continent of vastness and possibilities. Embark on a journey that will captivate your eyes and heart. Experience new wonders, encounter a colorful cast of characters and leave your mark on long-lost ruins.

“Only the relic can grant me the answer.”

Get ready to embark on a fantasy journey in a world of discovery, wonder and adventure.

name: Townseek
description:
Townseek is a relaxing exploration-trading game where you embark on a journey across the world of Explora and discover the lost legacy of Sir Reginald Sharkingston! Discover exotic landmarks, trade with faraway towns, fish, mine, and farm as you complete your journal and make a name for yourself!

The whole world is your sea now, so be sure to see all that it has to offer!

name: The Inspector
description: The Inspector is a short-form first-person adventure about exploring the human mind. As an Inspector, you have the delicate task of investigating the human mind in search of those elements that will bring our loved ones back to life

name: Lost Twins 2
description: Lost Twins 2 is an incredibly cute puzzle adventure that will challenge, entertain and maybe even inspire you. Guide Abi and Ben on their journey to find a way back home across a whimsical playground crafted with an enormous amount of care.

name: Fragile Existence
description: Take command of the last surviving fleet of humankind in Fragile Existence, a sci-fi RTS with fully 3D planet surfaces and vast solar systems to explore. Dispatch expeditions to find resources, build settlements, construct vital parts and supplies, and evolve your technology to meet new threats.

name: Memory Lost
description: MemoryLost is an action shooter, the battles in which are built around the mechanics of mind capturing and moving into the enemy's body. First-aid kits were not delivered, there is only one clip in the weapon - change the bodies to survive!

name: Eastern Tactics
description: Eastern Tactics is a classical Turn-base Tactic RPG (SRPG). Players need to train their team through battles, manipulate the character pieces to move, give orders correctly, selectively upgrade their characters with reasonable equipment and use skills to pass one level challenge after another.

name: Island of Winds
description:
Island of Winds takes you to 17th century Iceland, plunging them into a magical world teeming with trolls, giant spiders, and mythical creatures. Experience all of this through the eyes of the magic-wielding Brynhild, a member of the Balance Keepers who draws her magical power from the natural world.

Brynhild's journey has her on a quest to find her mentor, Hrymja, that will take her through nine incredible landscapes that draw on Iceland's stunning natural beauty. These locations range from the fiery Lava of Skjól to the treacherous Jökla lagoon and gleaming Obsidian Shore. Brynhild will face legendary creatures on her journey, such as the powerful and majestic Bear King, Hafgúfa - Guardian of the Sea and the majestic elven lady Vör of the Oasis.

name: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers
description: Set in the chaotic final years of the Ming Dynasty, WUCHANG: Fallen Feathers is an exploration of the hauntingly beautiful landscapes of imperial China and the battle against mysterious forces that transform a grim reality to supernatural horror.

name: Slumhack
description: Slumhack is an action-based puzzle game set in a post-pandemic world, one just like ours. Play as Neriko, a young girl living in a modern ghetto born of such reality, and hack your way through the streets of Cyberia to bring back hope and peace to the slum.

name: Mayday: The Survival Island
description: A sudden plane crash interrupts the journey of archaeologist and adventurer John Rudel, leaving him on a deserted and unexplored island, now he must use all his knowledge and skill to survive and return home. Explore, builds, hunts and fights as he tries to survive the mysteries of this island.

name: The Relic: First Guardian
description: "Guardian, gather the pieces of the great relic and seal the void of darkness." In this action RPG, you embark on a heroic adventure to save the world in the dark as the last guardian. Start your journey as a guardian, gather pieces of great relic and close the void.

name: ExeKiller
description: Retro futuristic, single player, action adventure game with western vibes. You are a bounty hunter trying to survive in dystopian, post-apocalyptic world.

name: The Mysterious Cat Tower
description: A turn-based J/W/GRPG. Find spells to add to your arsenal, pick impactful talents, tune your attributes, acquire powerful allies, freely reset your build and try something new. Find your own way to play as you experience the harsh life of the strongest pussy in Brazil.

name: Check x Mate
description: A fantasy visual novel set in a magical world of chess. Gameplay consists mainly of decision making and chess puzzles that represent what is happening in the story. There is a beginner difficulty for those new to chess and expert difficulty for those who seek more of a challenge.

name: Lethal Honor: Order of the Apocalypse
description: Brutal, obscure, and punishing action-adventure roguelite with a dark atmosphere and gothic hand-drawn graphic novel art.

name: Duil
description: Duil - Action platformer with RPG and Roguelike elements. A fascinating journey in a mysterious world full of secrets and surprises. Collect loot, upgrade your character, destroy enemies. The final of the game will depend on your decisions.

name: Spindle
description: Spindle is an old-school zeldaesque action-adventure where you slip into the role of Death. But you won't be alone: A pig is your companion! Obviously. Because of reasons.

name: Nullptr
description: An action puzzle game where you play the role of a hacker. Take down megacorporations by invading their servers, downloading their data, and getting out without being detected. Outwit defensive sentinel programs and expose the perfect route to access the databases.

name: World's Worst Handyman
description: Suit up as the "World's Worst Handyman" in this comedy stealth game where every job is a chaotic adventure! Dodge disgruntled clients, bungle repairs, and save your beloved animal shelter from bankruptcy.

name: Project: Aurora
description: Project: Aurora is an exploration game combining elements of RTS, survival and adventure games. You are the captain of the research mission, which lands on the surface of the newly discovered planet.

name: Medic: Pacific War
description: Become a medic - the true hero of war. Survive the horrors of the battlefield, dodge the bullets, and bring salvation to the wounded. Be their last hope in the chaotic reality of the Pacific Front. Patch, revive, and carry them to change the course of the battle! Be ready to make hard choices!

name: Mictlan: An Ancient Mythical Tale
description: Mictlan is an action-adventure third-person game set in the 15th century during the Spanish conquest of Mexico. Learn how to use weapons, conjure magic, pray the ancient Mesoamerican Gods in order to survive the journey across Mictlan, the Valley of the Death.

name: DokiToki: Time Slows Down When You're In Love
description: Manipulate, freeze, and unfreeze objects in 3D first person puzzles. Explore school, meet new friends, and enjoy an anime-style story as you clear each level. Solve each puzzle to confess your love in DokiToki: Time Slows Down When You're in Love!

name: Espiocracy
description: Espiocracy is grand strategy game with unique take on the Cold War. Play as an intelligence service (CIA, KGB, Stasi, Mossad, and many more): launch proxy wars, stage coups, steal war plans, assassinate enemies, and tilt world history in your favor.

name: They Speak From the Abyss
description:
Venture into the Abyss and face strange and horrifying monsters in this bone chilling RPG.

With the spirit Sophia at your side, you must venture into the nightmare-ish world of the Abyss in order to escape. Monsters will block your path, will you be strong enough to conquer them, or will you perish and join the other lost souls who roam the depths.

name: Generation Ship
description: You're the AI, responsible for a generation ship, mankind's last hope for survival. Build efficient raw material cycles and help your crew to survive a long journey in a realistic real-time simulation and find a new home for the human race.

name: Rhythm Towers
description: Dance. Defend. Adapt. Use your rhythm matching skills to build defensive towers, in order to fight back mysterious hordes of creatures that will stop at nothing to destroy the planet's rhythm core.

name: They Are Here: Alien Abduction Horror
description: They Are Here is a first-person horror story about a journalist who witnessed an alien abduction at the Grayswood farm. Explore the area armed with a flashlight. Take photos of evidence of aliens presence and get to the bottom of the horrifying truth.

name: Building Relationships
description: Roll, jump, and dash around as a house on a date in this silly adventure game. Meet eccentric structures, romance eligible bachelorx pads, and uncover the meaning of life... or you could go fishing instead (though we replaced the fish with cars to make more sense).

name: The Outer Worlds 2
description: As a daring and most likely good-looking Earth Directorate agent, you must uncover the source of devastating rifts threatening to destroy all of humanity. Your investigation leads to Arcadia, home of skip drive technology, where the fate of the colony, and ultimately the entire galaxy, rests on your decisions—your strengths, your flaws, your crew, and the factions you choose to trust.

name: Survival Machine
description: Build your base on a machine in a constant motion, travel through biomes with different resources, and prepare for the night when a zombie threat is much higher than during a day. Would you go solo or explore this new world with your best friends?

name: Honeycomb: The World Beyond
description: Honeycomb: The World Beyond is a survival-sandbox game set on an exuberant planet – Sota7. Explore its vast world and face challenges on your bioengineering journey. Crossbreed plants or animals, gather resources, craft items, and conduct experiments in order to develop new species.

name: The Knight of Nephiart
description: The Knight of Nephiart sees players leading a party in an adventure to take on a great evil. The game features a first-person perspective and turn-based combat.

name: Kosmos Connections
description: Three girls, one game. Will you be able to solve the mystery of the world of Kosmos and Uplink Alethia, or will you live out your days blind to the truth?

name: Nocturne
description: The afterlife is now digital. Discover that eternal life comes with sacrifice in a genre-defying RPG with unique rhythm combat.

name: Tank Squad
description: Tank Squad is a tactical-combat action game. Take part in big tank battles during World War II. Play single-player or coop (4 players). Repair your tanks, replenish supplies, manage the crew and get back to the action!

name: Don't Be A Baby!
description: Don't Be A Baby! is side scrolling run and gun with heavy influences from Metal Slug and Cuphead but with a focus on story and animated cutscenes to convey a hilarious narrative inspired from the works of Matt Stone and Trey Parker, Mike Jude, and Matt Groening.

name: Eternity Guards
description: The main idea of the game is a fantasy alternative to Valhalla. Scandinavian mythology is a thematic focus - the same style, ornaments and atmosphere where heroes fight for a place in eternity, there will be only one.

name: Pioner
description: PIONER is an open-world MMO first-person shooter set in a haunting, alternative-reality world where Soviet-era structures lie abandoned on a desolate, post-apocalyptic island. In this immersive environment, the gameplay experience is defined by dynamic PvE and PvP elements, where realism takes priority over traditional health bars or character levels. With a sprawling map of 50+ square kilometers, not counting hidden dungeons, players can explore a world rich with mystery and danger, encountering story quests and faction missions that influence relationships and loyalty rewards.

name: Agent 64: Spies Never Die
description: A retro FPS inspired by classic 90s console shooters. Explore new locales, accomplish varied objectives and fight against state-of-the-art 1997 enemy AI. A work of love by a dedicated fan.

name: Whisker Squadron
description: A fresh take on forward scrolling aerial combat! Choose your pilot and fight your way through procedurally-generated worlds and epic, randomized boss fights. You've got one life, and your tactical upgrade choices will be crucial to your success in this aerial roguelike.

name: Arctic Awakening
description: A first-person narrative adventure set in the unforgiving Arctic. Your plane crashed in a storm, leaving only your court-mandated therapy bot for company as you journey to find your co-pilot and uncover the mysteries buried beneath the ice.

name: Unbeatable
description: Unbeatable is a rhythm-adventure game where music is illegal, and you do crimes. talk your way through trouble as you explore vibrant locales. Fight your way through exciting arcade-perfect rhythm setpieces, featuring an original soundtrack by Peak Divide.

name: Instinction
description: Instinction is a prehistoric action-adventure game, with combat and exploration in multiple awe inspiring natural locations. Take on treacherous beasts and embark on an unforgettable journey.

name: Fate/Extra Record
description:
The “Moon Holy Grail War” begins anew…

The setting is a Spiritron virtual world called “SE.RA.PH.” built on the moon. Masters and Servants team up and fight for survival in pursuit of the “Holy Grail,” an omnipotent wish-granting device, in the Moon Holy Grail War which begins once again…

This is a remake of Fate/EXTRA, the first Fate series RPG originally released on July 22, 2010, now revamped for modern hardware with an expanded scenario, refreshed character graphics, and dramatic command battles utilizing a highly strategic deck-building system.

name: The Ranchers
description: The Ranchers is an open world country-life sim for 1-4 players. Raise animals, grow crops, craft machines, build your dream house and explore the gigantic open world where mines and dangerous monsters abound. Earn the villagers' respect and esteem. And who knows, maybe find love and start a family.

name: Tukoni: Forest Keepers
description: Tukoni: Forest Keepers is a cute and cozy puzzle adventure, based on a series of award-winning books by the Ukrainian artist Oksana Bula. Play as the forest spirit Tukoni as you meet unique characters, solve captivating puzzles, brew fragrant tea and explore a magical world filled with kindness. Play our free prologue now!

name: RoadOut
description:
The world is dominated by an A.I. and rebel groups take refuge in a desert area known as the DeadZone.

Claire survives by executing delivery, sabotage and murder contracts for local leaders, while discovering about her past, revealing strange evidence that links her existence with the origin of the A.I.

name: Edens Zero
description: This is a 3D action role-playing game based on the space fantasy comic/anime EDENS ZERO by Hiro Mashima, creator of Fairy Tail and Rave Master. The player controls a diverse cast of characters as they embark on an epic adventure across different planets while battling powerful enemies!

name: Projekt Z: Beyond Order
description: Projekt Z: Beyond Order is an atmospheric First-Person Zombie Co-Op-Shooter set in WW2. In this game, you get to play different characters, who have very different abilities, to find out more about the secrets of the german island you all crashed on.

name: Rogue Souls
description: Rogue Souls is a combination between a traditional "Roguelike" and the difficulty of a "Souls" game. Go through randomly generated dungeons, use different classes of characters each with different weapons to master.

name: Hyper Team Recon
description: Hyper Team Recon is an adorable 3D platformer about three aliens and their adventure across Earth! As a shapeshifting alien, morph into friends and foes alike to copy their forms and gain unique abilities to use with them! Travel across the world, solve puzzles, and fill your scrapbook!

name: Dark Fracture
description:
Dark Fracture is an indie psychological horror game played in first-person, targeted for early access release in 2021.

Over the course of the game, the player is faced with the character’s inner chaos – witnessing the world change around him as the barrier between reality and imagination seems to crumble.

name: The Cabbage Effect
description: A cartoon-pop-surrealistic twin-stick shooter on procedurally generated stages that takes place in an apocalyptic narrative.

name: Among Ripples: Shallow Waters
description: Among Ripples: Shallow Waters is an eco tycoon sim. Work with your team of scientists to build, repair and maintain the delicate ecosystem of your lakes. Experiment with flora and fauna - everything from vicious pikes to peaceful puddle ducks.

name: RevenBlade
description: RevenBlade is team-based third-person hero shooter with MOBA elements and a focus on melee combat with fast-paced action and mechanical outplays.

name: Heartworm
description: Pass through the threshold and enter a world born of memories. Defend yourself with a camera while solving death’s mysteries in a reverent evolution of 90’s survival horror, integrating both fixed cameras and over the shoulder perspectives.

name: The Pope: Power & Sin
description: Take on the role of the Pope, strengthen the authority of the Church State, fight for spiritual and political independence from pagans and the renewal of church structures. The rule of Pope is a torrent of numerous scandals, excesses and signs of moral corruption in the authorities of the Church.

name: Falling Frontier
description: Conquer a vast procedurally generated star system in Falling Frontier, a sci-fi RTS where intel and logistics are decisive factors. Design ships and raid enemy supply lines, lay minefields, construct recon stations, and ambush enemy forces within asteroid fields and nebulae.

name: Space Chef
description: Hunt down strange alien creatures and plants, then cook 'em! Deliver your tasty creations to the galaxy's most unsafe places on your homemade star scooter. In a quirky mix of exploration, cooking and action, you’ll rebuild your mysteriously destroyed kitchen using nothing but junk and scrap parts.

name: Esothe
description: A journey of a lonely wanderer through a forgotten land, located on a plateau separated from the rest of the world by a high wall...

name: Neverlooted Dungeon
description: Venture deep into the Neverlooted Dungeon and face its treacherous, deadly traps. Armed with your creativity, trusty weapon and magical items, find your own ways to outsmart the dangers in a highly immersive world. Be careful, become paranoid, be the first to loot!

name: Skate Story
description: Ollie, kickflip, and grind your way through the ash and smoke of the Underworld as you take on a seemingly impossible quest. Skate fast to destroy demons and save other tortured souls on your journey from a fragile beginner to a hardened skater.

name: Split Signal
description: A new puzzle game from LYNE creator Thomas Bowker with visual design by Peter Bentley.

name: The House in the Hollow
description: With stunning graphics, inspired by the 1920's Art Deco period, and a chilling soundtrack, the "House In The Hollow" will take you on a journey like no other. A journey filled with mystery, horror, and magic, where you are the master of your own fate.

name: Typhoon Unit ~ Butterfly Requiem
description: Squad up! Switch heroes on the fly, and chase down the Steel Butterfly in a world where magic and technology intertwine! Are you the right team for the job?

name: Choppa: Rescue Rivals
description: Choppa: Rescue Rivals is a chaotic arcade-style helicopter rescue competition game for one to four players. Take off with your trusty rescue chopper and carry disaster victims to safety before your rivals!

name: The Drifter
description: The Drifter is a 2d point and click adventure in the classic style. Taking cues from the recent revival of the genre there is an emphasis on story, with puzzle solving being the glue that ties it together rather than the focus. Mick's a pretty practical guy, and so puzzles are down-to-earth, designed to be unobtrusive, and give an investigative feel. We're keeping the pacing is quick and lean, you'll never be wandering around lost for long periods - Mick is propelled through the story at a good clip, from one situation to another, with barely a moment to catch his breath.

name: 2XKO
description: 2XKO is Riot Games' upcoming 2v2 tag-based Fighting Game with League of Legends Champions.

name: Crimson Desert
description: Experience the untold tale of mercenaries struggling to survive in the unforgiving lands of Pywel. Crimson Desert is an open world action-adventure with a narrative-driven single player, which follows the story of the mercenary Macduff, and multiplayer where you can also play the game with your own character. Being built on Pearl Abyss’ proprietary engine, Crimson Desert also aims to provide a unique experience by integrating its single player and multiplayer gameplay together.

name: Project Haven
description: Project Haven is a squad tactics game set on the mean streets of Earth’s last city. Lead the Steel Dragons - a mismatched mercenary crew - on high-risk missions, invest in equipment and stay ahead of the game one bullet at a time. Play the story solo or co-op, plus procedural skirmishes for 1-4 players.

name: Rhythm Bullet Hell
description: HyperCore is a “Rhythm bullet hell”, mixing the frenetic action of classic bullet hell shoot them up with semi-procedurally generated encounters based on the music.

name: Fata Deum
description: Fata Deum is a god game asking the player "With the power of a god, who will you become?". As a powerful god the player fights against up to four other (AI) gods to rule a fantastic world and its citizens. These citizens act self-sufficient and need to be convinced to follow the player.

name: Aleste Branch
description:
Aleste Branch is an upcoming sequel for the Aleste series

Aleste Branch features a gameplay similar to the earlier titles in the series but with various modern touches. The player can choose between three playable ships, each with its own weapons arsenal, with the game utilizing a vertically-oriented screen similar to Senjin Aleste. The ships are equipped with a standard, forward-firing gun which can upgraded and can equip different sub-weapons by picking up their corresponding icons. This time, the sub-weapons can be charged up by holding the shot button, unleashing a powerful attack which can be used only a limited number of times.

name: Sacre Bleu
description: You are a Musketeer imprisoned on false charges. Steam-blast your way out and find the evil-doers who framed you. Uncover a plot to take over France!

name: The Transylvania Adventure of Simon Quest
description:
The Transylvania Adventure of Simon Quest is a parody/homage to NES ClassicVania and other NES titles from the era.

The titular hero, Simon Quest, has just arrived in Transylvania only to discover his vampire hunting rival, Stan Helsing, has already slain the evil Count Dracula. In order to reclaim the glory that should be his, he journeys across Wallachia to gather what he needs to resurrect the dark count piece by piece and kick his ass himself!

name: Last Moon
description: The Moon is falling, malicious creatures appear, the world falls in chaos! Last Moon is an Action-RPG greatly inspired by the mythical titles from the 90s! Explore a mesmerizing, vast and ruined world riddled with dangers, face tainted creatures and upgrade your abilities in a classic hand-drawn 2D style.

name: Outrider Mako
description: Take on the role of Mako on her quest to seek out and subsequently deliver her, uh, deliverables in this top-down view 2D action game. Jump on top of your enemies and slime them with goo to stop them in their tracks! Get those deliverables delivered!

name: Earth From Another Sun
description: Explore the galaxy, establish and grow your empire, build your trade network, fight alongside the armies you command, and conquer the galaxy! Once you rule over all, remodel the galaxy as you see fit. Long live the Emperor!

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2
description:
Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 is the successor to the iconic RPG Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines. Set in a Seattle faithfully reimagined in the World of Darkness, Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 features reactive storytelling, fast-paced melee combat, and intriguing characters with their own hidden motives.

Created in an act of vampire insurrection, your existence ignites a blood war among the vampire factions who run Seattle. To survive, you’ll choose a clan and enter into uneasy alliances with competing factions in a world which will react to every choice you make. Unleash your supernatural powers against your prey, but be mindful of your surroundings at all times or run the risk of breaking the Masquerade (the absolute law of secrecy that keeps Vampire society hidden from humanity).

name: Night is Coming
description: Night is Coming is a survival building simulation set within the unforgiving cold of the Carpathian mountains. Build your settlement, nurture and protect your people - prepare for impending Darkness. Will everyone survive? Will evil displace your homestead? Will a Hero emerge?

name: Artificial
description: Artificial is a physics based first-person puzzle platformer inspired by Portal & Half-Life series. Interact with the environment, pick up and throw objects, sneak around enemies, control intricate physics-based mechanisms and learn how to survive in the underground colony of the Asteroid 2031 XT.

name: Netherworld
description: A weird jellyfish handles marriage crisis with alcohol, drugs, sex, blows and lots of odd characters.

name: Hive Quest
description:
Guide your insect tribe on an unusual journey through a mythical woodland filled with ancient magic, strange creatures & hidden mysteries. Uncover the secrets of the Old Orchard, find and train your very own woodland sprite and lead your Hive to victory!
Hive Quest is a story driven game with many layers:

- Colony building
- Pet management
- Exploration & mystery
- Weird puzzles
- Swarm battles
- Subterfuge
- Resource gathering
- Spell casting

name: Theropods
description: Face dinosaurs, solve puzzles and travel back to the time of ginormous lizards and pixelated adventure games.

name: Dino Run 2
description: Dino Run 2 is a hyper-evolved pixel-art single and multiplayer platformer with procedurally generated terrain, multiple dino types to play as with different strengths and skills, tons of character customization, and most importantly an unstoppable doom wall that's constantly on your tail.

name: Once Upon a Puppet
description: Once Upon a Puppet is a side-scrolling puzzle platformer developed by Flatter Than Earth.

name: Steam Punks
description:
Steam Punks is an action platformer in the vein of 90's retro SNES legends like Mega Man X and Super Metroid.

Take control of Dunns Calhan, one of Mayor Spurs elite enforcers, as he takes on the notorious Bowler Gang and tries to save Steamopolis from total destruction.

name: Grand Theft Auto VI
description: Grand Theft Auto VI heads to the state of Leonida, home to the neon-soaked streets of Vice City and beyond in the biggest, most immersive evolution of the Grand Theft Auto series yet.

name: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond
description: Developed by a new team under Nintendo producer Kensuke Tanabe. A return to the First Person Adventure gameplay focused on action, isolation, and exploration.

name: The Siege and the Sandfox
description: The Siege and the Sandfox is a 'Stealthvania' – an infusion of stealth into the familiar Metroidvania experience, creating a unique twist on the ever-popular genre. Lovingly realised in an evocative 2D art style, enriched with the power of Unreal Engine 4.

name: Dead Static Drive
description: Dead Static Drive is a horror survival adventure. You're on the road. The world begins to fall apart in front of you.
