Your friendships will make every bit of difference as order collapses and the people you meet fight for their own survival. Sneak, scavenge, fight, befriend, barricade and bunker-in or steal a car and drive off into the sunset. There's no escape; there's only what you choose to do with the little time that's left.

name: Tavern Keeper
description: In Tavern Keeper you manage a tavern, building, bartering, cooking and cleaning your way to success in a humorous fantasy world. Starting out with a shell of a tavern in the backwaters of the kingdom, you build rooms, place items, stock the larder and hire staff to satisfy the demands of the oddball locals and misfit heroes that stumble through your door. Run your business well and you'll progress to larger taverns with more demanding patrons where you'll need to expand your offerings to include new meals, drinks, rooms and services.

name: Mewgenics
description:
From the creator of The Binding of Isaac, Super Meat Boy and The End is Nigh comes... Mewgenics! A game where you hoard, breed, train and set cats out on epic adventures through a sprawling world of complete chaos.
Level up your team as you venture further and further from your home, collect unique items, defeat epic bosses, gain mutations and return home so you you can breed and further your bloodline, in this turn based legacy roguelike draft sim about cats!

name: Sanctity
description: Sanctity is a Hack & Slash RPG with platformer elements where you travel between the Real and Virtual Worlds in fast-paced combat against swarms of enemies and boss fights inspired by MMO raid design.

name: Cavescape
description: Escape a procedurally generated cave by grappling and swinging. Explore the depths of the ecosystem, fight foreign creatures, and upgrade your tools. Destructible environments, deep mechanics, and tough bosses!

name: Danger is Near
description: Danger is Near - sessional hardcore multiplayer shooter that includes several genres: FPS, survival, weapon and combat simulator, RPG with MMO phenomena. The game will immerse you in a realistic gaming environment imbued with a gloomy post-apocalyptic atmosphere...

name: Irony
description: You are a nameless mercenary, dispatched to the research facility 'UNDERDOG CORP.' Survive the horrors of this dangerous facility, twisted by human experimentation, and uncover the hidden secrets within before they consume you.

name: Heart of Artemisa
description: Heart of Artemisa is a rhythm adventure game, with dungeon crawler & Roguelite elements. The player has to defeat enemies and solve puzzles at the beat of music.

name: Aokaki
description: Aokaki is a fast-paced 2D platformer where you play as an isopod ronin. Explore fun and challenging levels while battling against the forces of the evil Shogun in this bug inhabited pixelart world.

name: Road Warriors
description: Survive on the road in this post-apocalyptic world! Road Warriors is a casual game with rogue-lite elements where your goal is to create the strongest build in one run!

name: Future Weapon 2D
description: Future Weapon 2D is a top down space shooter where you can relive the couch co-op glory days with up to 8 players across 2 screens. Grab a gun, grab a spaceship, upgrade everything, mine rocks, explore, and recruit the local townsfolk to conquer this demo.

name: The Adventures of Bryan Scott
description: 2D point & click adventure, that combines classic elements from games like "Broken Sword" and "Deponia".

name: Evolution: From the Little Light
description: A small creature is born in the depths of the ocean, beginning its journey for survival in a ruthless world. Embark on a 2D adventure full of exploration and puzzles, making crucial decisions, facing dangers and discovering the hidden secrets of evolution.

name: Nyan Heroes
description: Step into Nyan Heroes, a free-to-play, third-person hero shooter where intelligent cats pilot powerful mechs known as Guardians. Experience agility, strategy, and precision in a world shaped by feline intelligence.

name: Death Blonde
description: Death Blonde is a local multiplayer racing shooter. Join a world of cursed (blonde) skeletons with cool sunglasses. Isn't that enough for you? Let's also put in cars, drifts, weapons, explosions, and heavy-metal-electronic music, maybe that's more what you're looking for.

name: Try 2 Sleep
description: Try 2 Sleep is a casual, local Co-op horror game made for two players. An evil spirit has invaded your house, collaborate with your partner and survive the night terrors!

name: Welcome to Doll Town
description: In "Welcome to Doll Town," explore a cursed village where lifelike dolls roam. Uncover dark secrets, solve eerie puzzles, and survive the haunted dollhouses to escape a twisted nightmare.

name: Double Dragon Revive
description: Double Dragon Revive faithfully reproduces the thrill of old school side-scrolling action games, with updated controls and difficulty settings for the modern era, and utilizing Arc System Works’ fighting game development experience. Jimmy Lee, Billy Lee, Roper, Abobo, and more will appear in stylish 3D.

name: Love at The Milky Way Diner
description: A LGBT-friendly cozy sci-fi cooking/dating sim about making friends, finding love, and running a diner in deep space.

name: Directive 8020
description: Earth is dying and humanity is running out of time. 12 light years from home, Tau Ceti f offers a small sliver of hope. When the colony ship Cassiopeia crash lands on the planet, its crew soon realize they are far from being alone. In space, death takes many forms.

name: The Kharzov Effect
description: Welcome to The Kharzov Effect, an immersive first-person puzzle horror game. Explore Dr. Kharzov’s eerie estate as you unravel the mystery behind a series of abductions. Face terrifying creatures, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover the truth of Kharzov's dark history!

name: Sick Samurai
description: Sick Samurai is a blindingly fast and bloody action game based on instant-death combat. Immerse yourself in lofi hip hop and retro anime aesthetics as you slash and dash your way to becoming the greatest fighter on the island.

name: Pipkin
description: Explore a magical and spooky world, capture wild Pipkin, and fight alongside them, as you uncover a series of mysterious events happening around New Haven...

name: Digital Exorcist: CF1_Defrag
description: After the mysterious death of a Superstar Idol, disgraced DATA Agent Sawyer must face his ultimate challenge yet, being an undercover high school teacher while also keeping the Mississipi Inaka safe from Daemonic influence.

name: UpRooted
description: UpRooted is a 2.5d action-adventure featuring a mage and a paladin fighting to hack a virus corrupting a forest. Play as two and fight as one stunning as a mage and slashing as a paladin. The forest may be wilting, but at least you're not in this alone.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Daima: Adventure Through The Demon Realm Bonus Pack
description:
The DAIMA: Adventure Through The Demon Realm Pack Bonus includes the following items:
- Ultimate Meat Feast
- Mega Sacred Water
- Purple Dino Horn
- Awakening Water

These items enhance character attributes.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Daima: Adventure Through The Demon Realm Part 1
description: Sin descripción

name: House of Decay
description: Sin descripción

name: Goo Hunter
description: Play as a brave Slime treasure hunter who uses her unique abilities to overcome dangerous obstacles and solve intriguing puzzles. With her sticky hands, she skillfully launches herself, uncovering the best path to progress in her adventure.

name: A Hole in my Room
description: Explore a mysterious place and an atmospheric world filled with horrifying and unusual environments in this first-person psychological horror game. Find hidden objects, solve puzzles, hide from darkness, and enjoy a unique experience in the horror genre.

name: Deepspace Emporium
description: Deepspace Emporium is a gritty shopkeeping sim set in the depths of a sprawling space station. As a former scavenger turned merchant, you trade in goods of varying legality—all while facing rising rent. Navigate a divided society, balance faction demands, and dodge authorities as you try to survive.

name: Knightica
description: Recruit powerful units, place them strategically and find the best synergies in this Roguelike Autobattler! Knightica lets you guide a warband through many challenges to free the Kingdoms. Discover optimal combinations, weave powerful enchants, face dangerous monsters and lead your army to victory!

name: Grex
description: Sin descripción

name: Abashed
description: Abashed is a 2.5D narrative-driven side-scrolling game that lets you explore the life of Issac, a man living with psychosis. One day waking up all alone, he sets out to find the truth behind his missing partner. On the way he finds himself needing to confront his deepest fears and the darkest secrets. Join Issac in this story of love, loss, fear, and acceptance. Reality is not what it seems.

name: Twisted Jam
description: Twisted Jam is a fast-paced, arcade-style Frisbee like game set in a digital world. Contestants will battle it out for the top spot by scoring points within the goals.

name: Ninja Gaiden 4
description: The definitive ninja action-adventure franchise returns with NINJA GAIDEN 4! Embark on a cutting-edge adventure where legacy meets innovation in a high-octane blend of style and no-holds-barred combat.

name: NOIR: Dead On Arrival
description: Noir/Horror themed story rich interactive adventure indie game with party-based RPG elements. As you investigate various mysterious cases, you will learn more about the secrets of this dystopian world and maybe discover why most of mankind has turned into zombies. Each of your choices really matters

name: Cat Tree
description: Cat Tree is a relaxing indie game. Collect cats, watch them grow on your tree, and unlock new sections of it. Gather rare, epic, and legendary cats to create a unique collection and uncover all the secrets of the tree!

name: Tattoo Removal Simulator
description: Take on the role of a skilled tattoo removal specialist. Enjoy a soothing pace that lets you focus on the calming process of tattoo removal. Set in a small studio in a bustling city, your all clients share one goal: erasing parts of their past, marked by colorful images, texts, secrets and stories.

name: Age of Wonders 4: Archon Prophecy
description: Take command of the forces of light, in the Age of Wonders 4: Archon Prophecy Expansion. Join the celestial Archons as they strike back against Urrath’s corrupt forces. Consult the oracles and glimpse the hidden prophecies that shape the fates of the realms, and become the master of your own destiny. Contains a new culture, story content and prophecy events.

name: Captain Midnight
description: The tide always wins

name: Rematch
description: Control one player on your team and compete in fast-paced 5v5 matches from an immersive third-person perspective. Team up with your friends and join the action.

name: Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound
description: A brand-new side-scrolling entry to the NINJA GAIDEN series from the team behind Blasphemous, NINJA GAIDEN: Ragebound redefines the classic platformer saga in a spectacular, thrilling and challenging ninja adventure.

name: Space Hunters
description: Join space bounty hunters in a brutal 2D handmade beat 'em up, where every punch and kick is fueled by action and greed. Battle your way through a gritty, money-driven universe in this intense, fast-paced adventure.

name: Kentum
description: Stranded in the year 10,000, Kent—an average Joe turned clone—must survive, explore, and rebuild civilization with the help of a snarky AI. Craft, farm, and automate in this 2D craftervania adventure as you uncover Earth’s secrets and kickstart humanity, one machine at a time.

name: Cards and Dungeons
description: Cards and Dungeons is an action-packed roguelike dungeon crawler blending hack-and-slash gameplay with cards. Fight through procedurally generated floors teeming with monsters, gather loot, and unleash powerful effects with collectible cards. Will you survive the depths?

name: Dungeon Crawler
description: Dungeon Crawler is an upcoming roguelite, hack n' slash, platformer puzzle game. Makhoba discusses how Dungeon Crawler's imagination mechanic works, the inspiration behind the game's creation, and more.

name: There's Always a Madman: Bring the Thunder
description:
In this single-player spy thriller interactive novel, secret agents Franklin Benjamin and Virginia West take on a madman named Zeus who threatens the world with a weather machine.

You may find yourself needing to de-escalate a hostage situation, investigating a crime scene, or even defusing a ticking time bomb - good thing you always bring the thunder, agent!

name: Ritual Tides
description: Sin descripción

name: My Arms Are Longer Now
description:
You are a yucky long-armed thief. Snake through levels, retract like a vacuum cord, or put on a sock to seduce a lonely guard - whatever it takes to pull off the perfect heist!
You are a yucky long-armed thief. Snake through levels, retract like a vacuum cord, or put on a sock to seduce a lonely guard - whatever it takes to pull off the perfect heist!

name: Kernel Hearts
description: Gather your allies. Eliminate Angels. Transform into a Magical Girl. Slay god. Kernel Hearts is a Multiplayer Co-Op Roguelike Action RPG about four magical girls and their attempt to save a world that's drowning in ashes

name: Maple Forest
description:
Maple Forest is an action RPG inspired by a bunch of 90s classics. In it, you'll adventure across an island that's begun to sink for mysterious reasons. The residents of the island's main village tell you that their legends say the power of the god of the island is what keeps the island afloat.

The god of the island lives in a shrine at the top of the mountain, but that shrine has been sealed off by a huge stone door for longer than anyone in the village can remember. If there was a way to open that door and speak with the island's guardian, the island might be saved, but noone on the island has been strong or courageous enough to brave the island's wilderness in search of a way to unseal the door...until now!

name: Spook-A-Boo
description: Spook-A-Boo is a ghost-hunting couch co-op game for up to four players. Team up with friends and family to locate and capture sneaky ghosts hiding in plain sight.

name: Mafia: The Old Country
description: Uncover the origins of organized crime in Mafia: The Old Country, a gritty mob story set in the brutal underworld of 1900s Sicily.

name: Herdling
description: Guide a herd of mysterious creatures on a stirring and beautiful journey into the mountains… and beyond.

name: Dying Light: The Beast
description: Dying Light: The Beast is a thrilling standalone zombie adventure set in a tightly-crafted rural region. Play as Kyle Crane, a legendary hero who breaks free after years of brutal experiments. Now, he must realize there’s more at stake than just revenge.

name: Trifoil
description: Trifoil is a minimalist, cerebral line drawing puzzle game, that explores how lines can interact with themselves. It has multiple puzzle mechanics, secrets to discover and mysteries to solve.

name: Shadows of Chroma Tower
description: An immersive first-person Dungeon Crawler RPG with heavy roguelite elements and huge bosses in an Extraction setting. Level up, learn skills on a vast talent tree, develop your profession as a harvester or crafter, discover new recipes, loot and craft your way to becoming an unstoppable fighter.

name: Motorslice
description: In the ruins of a megastructure, a girl arrives with a single objective: Destroy every machine inside.

name: Tackle for Loss
description: Tackle for Loss is a 2D top-down action game that puts you in the shoes of a former American football pro. Violent combat, a captivating narrative, and dark pixel art combine to create a pumped-up experience, inspired by the likes of Hotline Miami.

name: AI.VI
description: A mercenary robot is forced out of retirement as the P.A.S.C.A.L. Gigacorporation conquers his planet to squeeze it dry. Combine your FPS and tower defense skills, then send the corporate invaders to the scrapheap, seize the means of production, and take the planet back for the worker bots!

name: Feline Forensics and the Meowseum Mystery
description: There's only one detective to unravel this murder turned museum heist... and they're the cat's meow. Interrogate a "colorful" cast of suspects until they cough up hairballs... and the truth. Will you wrap up the case in time for an afternoon nap, and make injustice knead its last biscuit?

name: Zurarararush!!!
description: Zurararush!!! is a twin-stick shooter that you can play easily! Wear a wig as a weapon and defeat the virus that mutated inside your body! Power up your character and wig and become stronger! Defeat a lot of enemies and feel good! It's an arcade-style casual game that you'll want to play every day.

name: Todokero! Tatakae! Calamity Angels
description: Sin descripción

name: A Blocc World
description: A voxel-style open-world RPG. Use a variety of melee, ranged and magical combat abilities to smash your way to saving the world. Grow your strength, with powerful abilities and equipment. Learn about the world of Blocc from friendly characters, and try to keep them in one piece.

name: Dobbel Dungeon
description: Gather your party, roll your dice and embark on a quest to discover why the local wildlife has suddenly turned evil! No two adventures are the same in this dice-powered tactical RPG!

name: Simulacro
description: In this first-person philosophical journey, Poísis, an enthusiastic art student, explores a mysterious island in Greece. As she solves the local puzzles, she uncovers traces of its ancient inhabitants, leading her to question her own reality.

name: Hell Games
description: Get ready for Hell Games: In this 4 player action arena brawler fallen Olympians, once cheaters and dopers, battle it out in the depths of hell. Knock out opponents with sports gear, power up, and strive to be the last one standing.

name: Golel
description: Golel, a first person roguelike Dungeon Crawler.Combat is focused on mobility and using the environment to your advantage.Dropping book shelves on an enemy, or kicking an enemy into a trap are all valid tactics.Deep skill/magic and combat gameplay, with many development paths.

name: Vultures: Scavengers of Death
description: Face zombies and fearsome monsters in this turn-based survival-horror roguelike as you seek the path to recover a valuable artifact. Unravel the history of Salento Valley and its downfall after a bioterrorist attack led by a secret cult involved with the powerful corporation Eugenesys Tech.

name: Nqc: Non Qualia Character
description: RPG where human who became NPC find himself.

name: Who Are You!?
description: 'Who Are You!?' is a strong narrative first person sci-fi psychological horror videogame, where you will play as Ray Roswell, traveling through his distorted memories and solving puzzles to understand what is real about his wife’s disappearance 20 years ago.

name: Wheel World
description: Dive into Wheel World as Kat, a rider chosen by ancient cycling spirits. Race elite teams, trick out your bike, and perform the long overdue Great Shift ritual to save a universe on the brink! Your bike is your destiny.

name: Hidden Pass
description: Hidden Pass is a tactical turn-based RPG with base management that blends tactics with fascinating visual effects. The game sets in unique technomagic fantasy world. Plan your steps carefully while you lead an expedition to the center of a vast cluster of uncharted isles floating high in the sky.

name: Everdeep Aurora
description: An ongoing apocalyptic meteor shower has forced the world’s population to settle underground. As Shell, a feline child who awakens to find her mother missing, drill downward from the surface layer through a tile-based underground and discover the Everdeep.

name: 3 Last Chances
description: 3 Last Chances is an Action RPG game with challenging combat and progression system that allows to create your own unique playstyle. You get 3 chances to replay a year, complete quests and find just the right method of weakening and overcoming the seemingly unbeatable final boss.

name: Huni Kuin: Beya Xinã Bena
description: A 2D platform game about the ancient stories of the Huni Kuin indigenous people, who live in the Brazilian Amazon. The entire game was produced in collaboration with the Huni Kuin communities of the Jordão river, in Acre.

name: Elation for the Wonder Box 6000
description: Elation For The Wonder Box 6000 is a first-person, claymation adventure game about going into the city to try and find a game from your youth that no one else remembers.

name: King of Conquerors
description: Your journey from adventurer to king will begin here!

name: Wink and the Broken Robot
description:
Explore the weird and cute post-apocalyptic world of The Outskirts while collecting coins and mysterious ancient treasures like floppy disks and cassette tapes

Wink is taking inspiration from Gameboy classics like Super Mario Land 2 and Link's Awakening, but doing its own little thing.

name: Campus Life
description: In Campus Life you’ll create your own college freshman. Experience the hardships of college in this amusing and engaging life sim game. Study hard and party even harder. Join a fraternity to meet new interesting individuals. It is entirely up to you how your academic career will progress!

name: Drops of Death
description: A murder mystery visual novel with a romantic twist. The killer is randomly chosen and you may unknowingly fall in love with them.

name: Creep
description: Experimental dark platform game that takes place inside a struggled man's inner world represented as the worm world. You control the worm form of this man as he shows why this world exists and how it's like to live there. You also visit past memories/analogies and gain new abilities.

name: Borderlands 4
description: See if you have what it takes to go down in history as a legendary Vault Hunter as you search for secret alien treasure, blasting everything in sight.

name: Unit Down Charge
description: A futuristic action rail-shooter! Action packed, and full of quirky character dialogues, unique level designs, and epic boss battles!

name: Terminator 2D: No Fate
description: Play as Sarah Connor and the T-800 through a variety of thrilling missions as they take on the T-1000 and try to put a stop to Skynet’s plans before the human race is annihilated. Lead the Resistance as John Connor in the future, fighting on the front lines as mankind’s only hope in the War Against the Machines. In this unique story blending iconic scenes from ‘Terminator 2: Judgment Day’ with original scenarios and multiple endings, humanity’s fate is yours to decide.

name: Hell is Us
description: If war is the closest we get to hell on earth, it's because Earth harbours the worst of demons: humankind. In an isolated country ravaged by infighting, discover the secrets of your past and deal with the repercussions of a mysterious calamity.

name: Hell is Us: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition of Hell is Us includes:
- The Hollow Walker Pack, featuring an exclusive skin for Remi and his drone KAPI
- The Military Pack, featuring an exclusive skin for Remi and his drone KAPI
- An exclusive investigation
- The Art Pack, including the digital artbook and original soundtrack

name: Tired to Fall
description: Tired to Fall is a puzzle-platformer where you collect, launch, and transform buddy-leaves into platforms to help a little leaf climb back to its tree. Jump, glide and solve puzzles in an undergrowth packed with spiky chestnuts, acorns, and cannon-mushrooms!

name: Expedition: Into Darkness
description: Expedition: Into Darkness is a medieval third-person cooperative dungeon crawler and extraction looter. Assemble weapons, customize gear, and join forces with up to four other allies. Survive the ruins—or lose everything you carr

name: Our Freedom
description: The medieval world is waiting for you! Stand up for your people and help them protect their freedom! Build your village, win battles and tournaments and become a famous adventurer in the game Our Freedom!

name: Termina
description: Termina is an intense, adrenaline-fueled, survival shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies. Dive into the heart-pounding action of endless waves of the undead, scavenging for power-ups, unlocking powerful weapons, and battling through hordes of relentless zombies until your last breath.

name: Kaisa: Resurrection
description: You play as the puppet of Kaisa an undead confused octopus with a fuzzy ambitions for vengeance and power. During the day you hack and slash your way through hordes of enemies to satisfy your masters needs. During the night... Well that's another story.

name: Nihilum
description: Step into 'Nihilum', a retro RPG that weaves together elements from the real world and a mystical fantasy realm. Take on the roles of Célestin and Alexandra, non-identical twins, who evolve and mature as you solve puzzles, unravel mysteries, and tackle survival challenges. Engage in strategic combat, level up, and equip your characters while discovering hidden treasures throughout the game. Embark on a journey filled with brain-teasers and battles that shape the twins' destinies in this captivating adventure. Dive deep into 'Nihilum' and uncover the secrets hidden in every corner of its unique world.

name: The Tale of Relm
description: Sin descripción

name: Shinobi: Art of Vengeance
description: Slay the enemies in the silence of the moment. Run through the world of Shinobi full of monsters and ninja actions. Grab Oborozuki, the legendary sword, and slay evil once more. Your clan and the world are counting on you.

name: Gates of Siberia
description: Racing with elements of survival and role-playing system. Travel to locations from all over the world, survive, participate in competitions, complete tasks and keep your travel blog in the new part of Wildland!

name: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater - Sneaking DLC Pack
description:
Equip yourself with this DLC pack containing a special set of stealth gear for Snake, including new uniforms, faces, and equipment, available in-game in METAL GEAR SOLID Δ: SNAKE EATER.
Pack Includes:
Uniform: Battle Dress (PW ver.)​
Uniform: Sneaking Suit (PW ver.)​
Uniform: Crocodile Suit​
Uniform: Naked (Woodland)
Uniform: Naked (Ammunition Belt)
Uniform: Gold
Face: Glasses
Face: Sunglasses
Equipment: Kerotan Mask
Equipment: GA-KO Mask

name: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater
description: The same gripping story and engrossing world, but now with cutting-edge graphics and 3D audio, which bring the jungle to life. Get ready for the ultimate survival, stealth and action experience.

name: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
The Digital Deluxe Edition includes both the game and the Sneaking DLC Pack at a reduced price.
Includes:
・METAL GEAR SOLID Δ: SNAKE EATER
・Sneaking DLC Pack
Uniform: Battle Dress (PW ver.)​
Uniform: Sneaking Suit (PW ver.)​
Uniform: Crocodile Suit​
Uniform: Naked (Woodland)​
Uniform: Naked (Ammunition Belt)
Uniform: Gold
Face: Glasses
Face: Sunglasses
Equipment: Kerotan Mask
Equipment: GA-KO Mask

name: Windborn: Wings of Fate
description: Soar through the sky and master the wind!

name: Slimes & Dusters TO
description: Lead an army of slimes on the offensive against the dusters that have invaded your planet and restore your home to its former glory in this Tower Offense game!

name: Stellar Code
description: Mysterious phenomena from space. A researcher's fatal accident. Cryptic codes engraved on an unknown material. Together with your brilliant sister-in-law, you must unravel a mystery that could determine the fate of Earth. A sci-fi mystery visual novel of discovery and suspense.

name: Carnival Massacre
description: Drawing heavily from classic survival horror tropes, Carnival Massacre takes players on a haunting quest in a cursed theme park. Explore your surroundings, manage your messy inventory, solve puzzles and kill the four ringleaders of the park.

name: Tomboy Adventure 2
description: Start a relaxing adventure together with your (girl) friend!

name: Rayless Blade
description: Venture into an unforgiving, open world and struggle alongside your team to one day, possibly, escape your terrible destiny.

name: Rangingstrike
description: Master the three weapons that change according to the humanoid robot form and fighter form, destroy the scattered enemy attack targets, and finally defeat the boss standing in your way!

name: Tales of the Shire
description: Welcome home, Hobbit! Live the cosy life of a Hobbit in the wonderfully serene landscape of the Shire. Discover, decorate, & share in this idyllic corner of Middle-earth. Join friendly Hobbits & familiar faces awaiting your arrival in Tales of the Shire: A The Lord of the Rings Game.

name: Cotton Reboot! High Tension!
description: Sequel to Cotton Reboot!

name: Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact
description: Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact is an upcoming Hunter x Hunter fighting game, developed by Eighting and published by Bushiroad Games.

name: Stronghold: Crusader - Definitive Edition
description: Gird your loins and sharpen your steel! Besiege 20 unique enemy lords and battle friends online, in this expanded remaster of the classic 'castle sim'. Relive history with new units, AI opponents, visuals, audio, campaigns, skirmish trails, co-op and larger maps.

name: Atomic Owl
description: Atomic Owl is a pixel art-based single-player, side-scrolling roguelike that combines fast-paced platforming with dynamic hack-and-slash combat and a variety of weapons, powerups, and a demonic blade. Journey through eight roguelike zones, save your friends, and take up arms against Omega Wing!

name: Swap
description:
Swap - third person adventure game. Explore colorful planets with unique landscapes, atmosphere and other features. From sand dunes to ice fields. Remember, each planet hides its own secrets.

Solve puzzles and overcome obstacles using the cat skills of your four-legged friend. Jump, climb, slide and use your cat instincts to get to the finish line.

Collect various objects and discover new mechanics.

Meet charismatic characters. With hostile alien creatures that will prevent you from reaching your goal.

Feel all the fear of the unknown in the skin of a small cat. To overcome all the obstacles, you need dexterity, agility, curiosity, inquisitiveness and an extra 9 lives.

Swap is a game that will make you fall in love with it from the first "meow", with its exciting gameplay, picturesque and varied locations, interesting puzzles, adventurous spirit, as well as a fluffy and cute main character. The game will become your new and ideal way to spend time with interest.

name: Retro Game Store Simulator
description: Build your own Video Game Store in 1984. Everyday until the end of 1989 gives you the opportunity to stock shelves, cycle your inventory, manage your prices, analyze historical trends to make your game store profitable. Use era-relevant technology and systems to prove that gaming has a future!

name: Code Violet
description:
Developed by TeamKill Media, Code Violet is a third-person action horror game, where you take on the role of Violet Sinclair, a girl plucked from the past who must unravel the mysteries of the Aion Bioengineering Complex as she avoids, hides or fights against the creatures who have overrun it.

With the evacuation protocol in effect, Violet’s main goal is to escape the complex and save those she cares for, but with the creatures and a mysterious Director doing all in their power to stop you, will you get out alive?

name: 180 Seconds: A Firefighter's Call
description: 180 Seconds is all about choices and consequences. Arriving at the scene of a fire, you will have only 3-5 minutes to rescue people from a burning building. You must decide what to prioritize once inside. Can you save everyone or will your choices seal the fate of those depending on you?

name: The Crew: Motorfest - Season 7
description: Sin descripción

name: Pale Coins
description: Pale Coins is an Action RPG set in a fantasy world with challenging combat, open world exploration and a variety of items. Traverse old forests, dark caves, weathered ruins and unknown places, to find the Champion's Coin and fulfill your greatest wish.

name: Ascend
description: Ascend is an adventure puzzle game where a young woman must navigate to the top of a mystical mountain learning the secrets of both the past and the future to find the balance in all aspects of life.

name: Mystery Trails
description: Delve into a first-person atmospheric adventure game, where you’re a mountain rescuer and a hiking guide who has just received information about an accident in the area. You know it might be too late for the victims, and soon you realize something strange happened out there.

name: Essentures
description: Essentures is inspired by the great games of the 90s and late 80s. You will experience a grand story driven adventure through 4 lore rich kingdoms wherein you can catch and collect mysterious creatures, using them as allies or weapons!

name: Fungiman 2
description: Just another adventure with your friendly neighborhood fungus — nothing to worry about… probably?

name: Boogey Hunters
description: Sin descripción

name: Settler's Domain
description: Settler's Domain is a settlement-building game with citizen and resource management elements. Build structures, recruit settlers, gather resources, and explore your surroundings.

name: Shapefighter
description: Sin descripción

name: Overencumbered In Another World
description: In this organisation puzzle game you must rotate, reload, combine and consume items to fit everything into your inventory.

name: Evoker's Gambit
description: Sin descripción

name: Expedition Chronicles
description: Sin descripción

name: Dice Legends
description: Sin descripción

name: With Dream
description: Sin descripción

name: Alliance Peacefighter
description: A linear, story-driven space sim in the style of 90s classics like X-Wing and Wing Commander. As a newly qualified Alliance pilot, you find yourself caught up in a plot to break the fragile peace between two galactic super powers.

name: Gemmy's Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Idle Craft
description: Start from the most basic elements and help your World evolve through the timeline of progress. Merge elements, unlock new discoveries, and enjoy a satisfying blend of idle and strategic gameplay! And you know what? Your World continues to evolve even while you're away!

name: Pokettohiro
description: Sin descripción

name: Ahapika: Heroic Agency
description: Sin descripción

name: Water Maid
description: Sin descripción

name: Dreamwalker
description:
Dreamwalker is a top-down story RPG game with deckbuilding combat.

Embark on a journey through dreams and nightmares in Dreamwalker, a 2D top-down RPG set in a mesmerizing pixel art world. You are a wandering traveler, drawn to a small village shrouded in mystery and cursed by an ancient evil.

name: Operation Zero
description: Grab your biggest gun and jump into this story-driven top-down run-and-gun sci-fi arcade shooter starring the ultimate bio-engineered hero-manchild TASKILLER!

name: Rustic Defense
description: Sin descripción

name: Maya: Cats of Istanbul
description: Sin descripción

name: Blueprint Bob
description: Stack, twist, and balance your way to record-breaking heights. Create the tallest, most daring structures imaginable, and help Bob reach for the sky!

name: The Naki Files
description: Sin descripción

name: Ballardo
description: Sin descripción

name: Luck & Loot
description: Luck & Loot is a dice-building roguelike set in a 1-bit dark fantasy world. Craft and customize powerful dice, collect game-changing relics, and battle corrupted foes across procedurally generated dungeons.

name: Dare to Lucid Dream
description: For the first time in years, Sonny meets a person he knows inside of his lucid dreams and, to his surprise, Sonny discovers that what he says and does in his dreams directly affects the people he dreamed about.

name: You Die Today
description: Combine deck-building and dice-rolling in this tabletop-inspired roguelike dungeon crawler! Roll D4s, D6s, D20s, and more to activate powerful card abilities and conquer dynamic encounters.

name: Monster Train 2
description: It's time to raise Hell in Heaven! Monster Train returns with all new clans, new enemy factions, new challenges, new modes and more! Defend your Pyre in the classic three-tiered, vertical gameplay that made the original roguelike deckbuilder a hit.

name: DeadWire
description: Hack, link, and shoot in a fast-paced top-down cyberpunk shooter. Create devastating chain reactions to outwit enemies, break records and save your childhood mentor from a ruthless syndicate

name: Spring Tales
description: Spring Tales is a cozy 2D puzzle adventure game. Help the charming residents of Blossomdale prepare for their spring festival by solving puzzles, overcoming challenges, and rebuilding after a storm. Experience a heartwarming story filled with friendship, hope, and community spirit.

name: Better Mart
description: Welcome to Better Mart, a dynamic management game where you create, customize, and grow the ultimate supermarket! Combining fun and strategy, this game gives you complete freedom to design a unique store, attract customers, and maximize your profits.

name: Wordatro!
description: Discover Wordatro!, a simple and easy-to-get-into single-player roguelite. Form words to accumulate points and unlock bonuses. With over 50 bonuses and challenges to refresh each game, Wordatro! is perfect for fans of word games and strategy.

name: Toward Dawn
description: Inspired by Welsh mythology, experience a classic fantasy RPG adventure focusing on recovery after traumatic events. Customise your abilities, craft new equipment and Break your enemies in strategic turn-based combat.

name: There's No Dragons
description: There's No Dragons is a hidden object game with a selection of 9 locations and random dragons to find for each of them.

name: Cast n Chill
description: Sin descripción

name: ReCharge RC: High Voltage
description: Drift your way into ReCharge RC: High Voltage! Customize your vehicle, Create your very own race tracks, Share them online and race your friends best times with global online leaderboards. Created by an RC enthusiast, for RC enthusiasts!

name: AquaDream
description: Guide your anglerfish through intricate underwater mazes. Collect stars, solve puzzles, and avoid perilous obstacles. Experience a captivating deep-sea adventure filled with hidden treasures and mysteries in this immersive aquatic world.

name: Auto-Crisis
description: You're driving away on a forest road, late at night, under a heavy storm. Your car breaks down. Luckily, there might be a gas station nearby. But a misfortune never comes alone. The storm has brought something else, something otherworldly that oddly smells of spilled diesel oil.

name: Slime Attack: Survivor
description:
Slime Attack: Survivor is a roguelike action bullet heaven game where chaos reigns supreme! Dive into intense battles against waves of dynamic slimes and formidable bosses. Customize your character with unique gear and spells, and navigate through thrilling quests to unlock new content. With strategic resource management and heart-pounding action, every run is a new adventure.

Think you have what it takes to take on the slime invasion and become the ultimate survivor? Prove it!

name: Campus Fantasy
description: Start with one billion! You will transform into the male protagonist of Shuangwen and go to school. Sports cars and airplanes are just your means of transportation. Villa beauties are also your standard equipment. With the ability to make money, you are the Veyron for school!

name: A Directionless Cycle
description: 2D Sokoban game where you control multiple tiles, with different directions, at the same time.

name: The Black Vault
description: You play as a software engineer who just came back from his job and got a message from his friend that a hacking group called "The Black Vault" is recruiting new members. Throughout the night you'll be given different tasks you'll have to complete in order to get into the group. As the night continues, you gather the attention of some shady people that will try to stop you from getting into The Black Vault. You must crack into servers and devices in order to obtain valuable information while avoiding getting murdered by a bunch of Deep Web killers.

name: Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero DLC 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Adhvan Chakra
description: Command divine aerial forces in a real-time tactical combat experience set in a dharmic fantasy world. Strategize, adapt, and upgrade to defend vast territories from devastating invasions. Uncover ancient artifacts, perform sacred rituals, and unravel the mystery of the Adhvan Chakra.

name: You Have A Delivery
description: You Have A Delivery is a stylized, fast-paced FPS action game, inspired by action-comedy films. Take down the mafia in one night: rip apart your enemies, unlock guns and perks, and deliver unstoppable chaos. You're the only one who can pull it off. Can you deliver it?

name: Öooo
description: A Bomb Caterpillar's Big Adventure! "Öooo" is a charming yet mysterious exploration puzzle platformer where you discover creative ways to use bombs!

name: Medix
description: How much can a person endure, and what is the true value of human life? In this minimalist real-time strategy game about war medics, you fight for your own survival and that of others while the army is under constant pressure, retreating from a superior enemy. A narrative campaign, accompanied by hand-drawn illustrations, takes you through the story of physicians pushed to their breaking point in their fight for a sliver of hope.

name: Find or be Found
description:
Find or Be Found is an asymmetric co-op horror game. Go on heists as a pair of burglars looking for the most valuable items in haunted houses. Locate the specific item to earn money and progress, but search for too long, and unimaginable horrors will awaken.

Play as either the hacker or the robber. Only the hacker knows what to steal and where to find it, and only the robber inside the house can grab it. Communication is key.

name: Alien Market Simulator
description: Run a market on your space station. Restore and upgrade the station, expand your services, and sell to a variety of alien customers. Experience the challenge of managing a business in space and growing your market

name: Blasted Dice
description: Blasted Dice is a roguelike deckbuilder where you assemble a deck of dice to blow up your enemies. Achieve masterful combos, acquire legendary items, meet strange characters and blow up your enemies with your very own dice launcher.

name: Age of Wonders 4: Giant Kings
description: Restore the Elder Giants to their rightful place as masters of the Astral Sea, in the Age of Wonders 4: Giant Kings Expansion. Explore the ruins of their fallen empire, seek out forgotten crystal magic to empower your armies, and delve for forgotten treasures deep beneath the earth. Contains a new giant ruler type, dwelling and hand crafted regions to explore.

name: Void Sails
description: Void Sails is a single-player adventure where you captain a flying ship across uncharted space. Sail through mysterious worlds, battle powerful foes, and make story-defining choices. Uncover dark secrets in a game where every discovery could bring you closer to the truth—or to madness.

name: Fogpiercer
description: Build your train to build your deck. Fight off bandits in a post apocalyptic world. Progress and unlock new train combinations with synergies. Get drivers to their final destinations.

name: Don't Kill Rumble
description: Sin descripción

name: Chained Echoes: Ashes of Elrant
description: Eldrea is calling once again. Eldrea needs you. One. More. Time. Ashes of Elrant is the official DLC for the highly acclaimed Chained Echoes, offering you more of what you enjoyed so much. Meet all your beloved characters and answer the call as the Crimson Wings are needed once again.

name: Sofia in Exchange for Lies
description: Peek into the sins and memories of five personalities through surveillance cameras. This is an immersive, mystery adventure game that unravels the thoughts of the dark past that lie dormant inside Sofia, a suspect in the murder of a presidential candidate, and uncovers the truth behind the crime.

name: And Roger
description: It was a morning like all others, until she realized her dad wasn't home. In his place, a stranger who speaks nonsense and insists she "takes her medicine". Who is he? Where is dad?

name: Expedition to the Backrooms
description: You are the exploration team from company Async, you arrive to reported anomaly place and searching for anomalies, but what would you find? Prepare yourself for a gripping and heart-pounding adventure in EXPEDITION TO THE BACKROOMS, where every step could be your last.

name: Hell Clock
description: Forge powerful builds with endless loot in this relentless combination of Roguelike and ARPG. Blast through dungeons and unleash inhuman powers in a dark fantasy twist on Brazil’s War of Canudos.

name: Evil Timefall
description: Evil Timefall - hardcore FPS, where you fight against medieval evil. Immerse yourself in dark horror, where you kill zombie knights, witches and demons. Dive into the meat slaughter, where cruel enemies attack you from the darkness. Upgrade guns to execute more servants of the bloody lord.

name: Poradora vs. Monsters of the World
description: Poradora vs. Monsters of the World is a 2.5D action-adventure platformer where you travel across the coolest places on earth to defeat all the monsters and find all the mythological secret there! Now let's jump, shoot, slide, and defeat all the monsters! LET'S GO!

name: Rogue Loops
description: Rogue Loops is a roguelite action game where a trapped family battles to escape an endless loop. Combine unique skills and relics to create powerful synergies against the loop’s guardians. As you grow stronger, so does the loop—can you break free from this relentless cycle?

name: Smash It Wild
description: Smash It Wild is a tactical turn-based game combining volleyball and dodgeball in a fantasy universe. Upgrade your players and defeat your opponents in an intense roguelike competition!

name: Spray Paint Simulator
description: Sit back, relax and express your creative side in the colorful world of Spray Paint Simulator. Enter the town of Spatterville, meet the locals while you restore, repair, mask and spray paint everything from a kitchen to local landmarks. Buy new equipment, unlock Free Spray and transform the town.

name: Weldiver
description:
Each mission in Weldiver is a journey into the ocean’s depths, where players undertake the challenging work of maintaining offshore structures, performing emergency repairs, and replacing seabed infrastructure like optical cables, pipelines, and power lines.

Forty times more likely to die than the average worker... and every time I go down, the pressure waits. Trying to make me implode, drown, freeze... or worse.

name: Mobs 'N Monsters
description: Manage a spooky castle of monsters & fend off angry mobs with Slingshot action in this Physics-based Tower-Defense RTS. Fling vampires, mummies, & more to make the local villages crumble. Upgrade your units & castle between battles for impenetrable defenses & cause monstrous destruction!

name: Blind Exposure
description: Navigate through claustrophobic, completely dark world illuminated only by scans you manage to create; listen carefully to sounds coming from the darkness, and don’t let dread and paranoia get to you.

name: Thorny Times
description: You will have to gather an army, explore vast strategic maps, learn spells and capture castles. Defend the royal throne in battles against enemy knights, sorcerers and evil beings.

name: Ayasa: Shadows of Silence
description: Dive into Ayasa, a dark and mysterious platformer where light and shadow hold the key to survival. Journey through six haunting lands, solve challenging puzzles and restore balance to a world on the brink of collapse.

name: Spectral Prison
description: Trapped in an endless cycle, David Echo must navigate haunted houses and terrifying dimensions to escape the sinister warden. Find hidden keys, avoid monsters, and break free from the nightmare. Can you survive?

name: Nubs!
description: Slap yourself into the absurdity of Nubs, where 5-player battles are as chaotic as they are quick! Risk it all for the mighty Konzumos' delight in this arena brawler and smash the others to nublivion in your quest for glory! Simple rules? Check. Roguelite progression? Sure. Predictability? No way!

name: Deep Copy
description: Deep Copy is a top down point-and-click literary adventure set in a hand-painted science fiction world. Awakened with no memory, you must solve puzzles and navigate a branching story to piece together the dense, interconnected mystery at the heart of the lab.

name: Netherworld Covenant
description: In the abyss where the mortal realm and netherworld intertwine, becoming a warrior wielding the power of the Ethereal Torch to fight along with the fallen souls. With hardcore action and intriguing roguelike builds, shatter the cursed barriers and unveil the truth woven from blood and soul.

name: Red Rocket Defencism
description: You, a military officer from our great autocratic motherland, must protect our precious rockets from the evil capitalist enemy in this revolutionary base building strategy game. Bribe! Surveil! Purge! Imbibe! The end justifies the means when you have to protect our invaluable rockets!

name: Armed Decobot
description: Armed Decobot is a unique blend of Beat 'Em Up and Bullet Hell Shoot 'Em Up mechanics inspired by Treasure and Metal Slug. It seamlessly combines the crowd control & throw heavy melee combat of Beat 'Em Ups with the intense dodge & shoot gameplay of Shmups. It's fast paced, it's difficult, it's chaotic, it's a pure unbound arcade action game! A quick burst of adrenaline to start the day!

name: Runeborn
description: Runeborn is a dark fantasy roguelike that merges deckbuilding with a slot-machine-like mechanic. Forge your runebook, crush enemies, and combine trinkets of boundless power to destroy the forces of Despair!

name: Project Rogueteers
description:
Third-Person "PVE" Co-op Shooter with Roguelite Elements
In the year 3000, humanity's last stand against sentient AI is at a stalemate. Choose your hero and unite in the digital world in a showdown against shadow algorithms.

Enter the Nullverse.
Everything happens in a virtual multiverse, where each world offers a unique adventure waiting to be discovered.

Choose your upgrades, and customize each run.
This world is full of possibilities with random abilities, diverse enemies, and ever-changing maps, the only certainty in Project Rogueteers is uncertainty.

Unlock Rogueteers, and flex their abilities.
You'll discover a diverse array of characters, each equipped with their unique abilities.

Ass whoop challenging bosses in co-op.
Gear up and rally your teammates to devise strategic plans that will help you vanquish your foes and conquer every mission.

name: Forlorn Souls of Wicked Past
description: "Eldritch Verdict": A dark fairy tale turn-based card game. Strategic planning and battle execution shape your adventure amid challenges. Progression customizes character growth for a deep, replayable experience.

name: Yakuza Wars
description:
Yakuza Wars is an upcoming mobile game developed by BBGame and SEGA.
It's a strategic game based on the Like a Dragon series with many characters from the original series.

name: Star Wars Outlaws: A Pirate's Fortune
description: "A Pirate's Fortune" is the second story expansion for Star Wars Outlaws, an open world action adventure game from Ubisoft. The Trailblazer’s reputation precedes Kay as she runs into veteran pirate Hondo Ohnaka, who is looking to settle old scores with a ruthless gang of pirates.

name: Sea of Stars: Throes of the Watchmaker
description: This Sea of Stars DLC finds the Solstice Warriors Valere and Zale venturing into the miniature clockwork world of Horloge. In this magical land where denizens are threatened by a cursed carnival, our heroes will need to adapt to unfamiliar rules if their Sun and Moon powers are to manifest.

name: Mightreya
description: Join schoolgirl superhero Reya and her manager Nio as they embark on their journey as Hero Content Creators, fighting monstrous beings that emerge daily from a dimension beyond. Anime-inspired, heart-pounding hero action is waiting for you!

name: The Dreamers Foresight
description: Embark on a dreamlike journey as a ninja in this roguelite adventure, shaping your world with randomized biome tiles, align similar Tiles for better loot. Build a powerful deck from a variety set of cards while balancing your energy to battle relentless nightmare creatures.

name: Skyline Savior
description: Control Sam’s car in Skyline Savior with arcadey movement, jumping, dashing, slow motion, and downforce skills. Conquer obstacles in regular, pretty hard, and impossible modes for the ultimate challenge.

name: FaeTerra
description: Collect and battle with 121 unique creatures, manage your team, level-up, and evolve your Fae's. Summon them into battle and create impactful synergies and defeat your opponents in PVP!

name: Polyaris
description: Polyaris is a single-player, first-person survival skiing game set in a post-nuclear, procedurally generated Arctic world. Survive the cold, ski through icy wastelands, find essential resources, fight enemies, and uncover the mystery of why you are the last one alive.

name: Ultimate Jello Party
description: Ultimate Jello Party is a multiplayer party game that combines elements of card, board and minigame battles. Challenge up to 3 friends and mess up the game with your strategies! Earn coins, plan your moves, collect and accumulate jellies to become the big winner.

name: Nora: In Search of Hidden Ingredients
description: Help Nora find the missing items around her house! Try the regular difficulty mode as well as shadows and dark mode.

name: Mystopia
description: Mystopia is a relaxing sandbox game about building your own worlds and crafting magical potions. Discover blocks inspired by witchcraft, use potions for mystifying effects and build your dream worlds! The only limit is your imagination!

name: Caution Ahead: Part 2
description:
This is the second installment of a three-part series featuring a run-and-hide type horror experience, with each part consisting of three chapters.

You follow the story of John Rand, an experienced search and rescue officer stationed at Richburg National Park.

After the events of Part I, John continues his relentless search and rescue mission. He must venture further into the depths of Richburg National Park before it's too late to save both Michelle and Elena.

* Chapter 4: The search.
* Chapter 5: Run for your life.
* Chapter 6: Almost there.

name: Sinned Arena
description: Sinned Arena is a classic arena shooter inspired by timeless 90s games. You are trapped in Hell with other unfortunate souls, fighting among each other for demons twisted pleasures. Fight for your way out this dark place but beware, demons aren't there just to watch.

name: Cozy Dungeons
description: Explore deadly dungeons, clear them out of enemies and renovate them in Cozy Dungeons, a one-of-a-kind adventure/interior design game!

name: A Ruthless World
description: Embark on an adventure through a ruthless, 80s-inspired platformer world.

name: Sheep Sweep
description: Sheep gone missing! Join a goofy solo or coop adventure. Use various tools in a fully flammable world, crack unique puzzles, bypass obstacles and safely recover all the missing sheep.

name: Coding Day
description: In "Coding Day", you are a videogame developer whose project is about to be released, but a sinister entity threatens its publication, and you must survive it throughout the night in a dark office building full of mysteries and dangers.

name: A Building Full of Cats 2
description: Welcome back to the world of A Building Full of Cats! In this sequel, not only will you be petting all the cats in the building, but you'll also be assisting its residents with various tasks. Can you pet all the cats and make a difference in the lives of the building's residents?

name: Biped 2
description: Adorable robots are back to save the day! Explore an unknown planet in this puzzle action-adventure game and experiment with our unique, innovative mechanics solo or in co-op with up to 4 players!

name: Into the Restless Ruins
description: A roguelike deckbuilder where you build the dungeon you fight through. Each night use your cards to expand the ruins then battle through them harvesting Glimour from the residents, so The Maiden may grant your heart’s desire. But be warned - eventually your trespassing will awaken The Warden.

name: Cities: Skylines II - Bridges & Ports
description: Livelier coasts are now available with this new expansion, Bridges & Ports! With a new set of tools you are now able to create a bustling port to your city, and add beautiful new details like draw bridges and lighthouses.

name: The Sacrifice
description: Immerse yourself in this dark atmospheric puzzle game set in the region of Salem in the 17th century! Help Sarah guide her father with her magical play board and avoid the many dangers of The Sacrifice.

name: Little Oceania
description: Little Oceania is a minimal strategy building game. Create a delightful medieval kingdom in the middle of the ocean by placing cute miniature structures. Plan your space well, earn money, discover new buildings and biomes, and continually expand your picturesque island kingdom.

name: Headlice
description: Headlice is a reverse horror game where you play as an escaped biological abomination fleeing an inept corporation. Embrace your parasitic nature and become the monster you were meant to be.

name: Star Scum
description: Star Scum is a deckbuilding tactics card battler about space pirates. Build your deck and customize your ship as you travel across dangerous space delivering cargo in a roguelike mode or build custom decks and battle other players online or practice against an AI opponent.

name: Subversive Memories
description: A classic survival horror game set in the obscure backrooms of an old dictatorship. Unravel an ancient mystery, escape ominous presences, and scavenge every corner of this land.

name: Amnea28: Two Eternities
description: A group of university students is going to spend a week in the old hotel "Amnea". Within these seven days they have to find out what is hidden behind its facade and to unravel all the mysteries without losing their minds.

name: Void War
description: Command an ancient starship and fight your way to the heart of a dying Empire. Fend off attacks from demented cultists, craven space pirates, and xenophobic Imperial soldiers. Discover powerful artifacts and use them to build your ship into a fearsome war engine.

name: Squirrels Gone Nuts
description: Squirrels Gone Nuts is a fast-paced, multiplayer, arena shooter. Play as a speedy squirrel able to run on any surface and wield various guns. Procedurally generated arenas paired with an innovative game mode that blends capture the flag with king of the hill ensures a fresh experience every match.

name: My Drug Cartel
description: My Drug Cartel is a drug plantation management game with basebuilding and combat elements. Expand your plantation, hire workers, research new drugs and construct buildings. But be ready to face a heavy response by law enforcement by hiring guards, buying weapons and ammunition and building defences.

name: Sunflowers and the Goddess of Death
description: A classic style, story-driven RPG centered around a young woman determined to protect her people from fel beasts and the interminable greed of men, all while struggling against the manipulation of a goddess who seems to want nothing more than to paint the world a flowing crimson...

name: Alchemy of the Earth
description: Explore the dreamscape of an alchemist. Uncover his attempts to use alchemy to bring back the dead. Survive in a doomed world, where the alchemist's failed experiments linger behind, guarding his abandoned secrets.

name: Sol Cesto
description: Sol Cesto is a tactical and frenetic roguelite in which you have to master your luck. Choose a hero and reach the bottom of a random dungeon. In this grim world, every action has consequences...

name: Shroomtopia
description: Shroomtopia is a relaxing and atmospheric puzzle about manipulating soils and blending colors. Use your logical reasoning to solve challenges and help bring nature back to life.

name: Overnet
description: Forge a legendary legacy in this electrifying free-to-play Collectible Card Game where you can create your own characters, craft your cards to build perfect decks and engage in epic battles as you rise to become the supreme OverKnight.

name: Dark Lessons
description: Can you survive your teacher in this psychological horror game? With only candles for light and trapped in her home, you have to uncover her family's dark secrets. Solve puzzles, connect the dots and escape. But beware: There is someone else playing games with you, and someone who needs your help.

name: CleanFall
description: CleanFall is a dynamic tower defense rogue-lite set in a post-apocalyptic subterranean ecosystem. Gather supplies as you descend the abyss, meeting oddities and strangers of every kind. Prepare yourself- the depths will not surrender their secrets easily.

name: Cauldron
description: Cauldron is an upgrade-heavy, minigame-centric, turn-based RPG. Play minigames to strengthen your party, then fight battles to uncover more map, more heroes, more minigames, more everything! If your favorite plant is an upgrade tree, then this game is for you!

name: Kemono Teatime
description: Relax in the world of Kemono Teatime, where animal ears are a normal part of everyday life. Here in Melodius, you can whip up whatever blends of tea you desire in your favorite cafe as you play through an adorable story. Come now and live out your bestest and cutest life—down to the last drop.

name: Blood Sins
description: Embark on a heroic quest in Harda, a kingdom threatened by dark forces from Wick. Unravel the mystery of Amrak's invasion, aided by allies like Jahnarr, Maugh, and Gonel. Your choices shape the fate of the realm. Can you restore peace to Harda?

name: Tidebound
description: Tidebound is a fishing and inventory management game with a relaxing, casual atmosphere. Catch, sell, upgrade your boat, and sail further to catch more expensive and exotic sea animals. Casual yet engaging, the game offers a sense of progress with tons of equipment and hundreds of species to catch.

name: Mecha Break
description: Mecha Break is a multiplayer mech game that allows players to choose from diverse mechs, customize appearances, and battle colossal war machines on treacherous terrain. Get ready for the ultimate showdown—blitz, brawl, blaze!
